papers.title: Securing Content in Decentralized Online Social Networks: Solutions, Limitations, and the Road Ahead
papers.authors: Roberto Di Pietro
papers.abstract: The most popular On-line Social Networks (OSNs) are based on centralized architectures where service providers (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram) have full control over the data published by their user---a requirement of their business model, based on the monetization of the cited data [2]. In addition, such centralized architectures also increase the risk of censorship, surveillance, and information leakage [3]. Distributed On-line Social Networks (DOSNs), instead, are typically based on a P2P architecture, where there is no central service provider in control of user data. Indeed, the contents that are published on DOSNs are stored on user-provided devices, that also cooperate to execute the tasks needed to realize the intended service. Most of the popular DOSNs, in an effort to help users smoothly regulate content sharing in adherence to their privacy preferences, allow to organize users in groups. In this way, each user can choose to share content with the users belonging to specific groups only. The lack of a (logically) centralized, third party managed, reliable infrastructure to guarantee content availability---whether a given user is on-line or not---has led to have the contents published by a user to be stored on the devices of other users as well. Indeed, such a choice increases the chances that at least one of the cooperating users device (and the contents stored therein) is online when the content is required. Given the two above introduced (conflicting) requirements: group-oriented privacy setting and distributed storage, a critical feature of DOSNs is that published contents must be properly protected by the DOSN infrastructure, in order to ensure that they can be accessed only by users that have the appropriate permissions---granted by the publishers. Hence, DOSNs require efficient solutions for protecting the privacy of the contents published by each user with respect to the other users of the social network. While some preliminary solutions have been proposed [1], the literature lacks of a general systematization of DOSNs, in particular for what concerns the access control models in place to secure access and to ensure content availability. The same lack of systematization can be noticed when considering the pros and cons of the different models in place, especially when analyzed through the lenses of performance. In this talk, we investigate and compare the principal content privacy enforcement models adopted by current DOSNs. In particular, we will discuss their suitability to support different types of privacy policies based on different user-group modelling. The discussion is supported by an evaluation carried out by implementing several models and comparing their performance for the typical operations performed on groups, that is: content publishing, user join and leave. Further, we also highlight the limitations of current approaches and show future research directions to help DOSNs become a relevant player in the On-line Social Networks ecosystem, so as to put users back in control of their generated content.
papers.abstract_zh: 最受欢迎的在线社交网络(osn)基于集中式架构，服务提供商(如脸书、Twitter或Instagram)完全控制其用户发布的数据——这是其商业模式的要求，基于引用数据的货币化[2]。此外，这种集中式架构也增加了审查、监视和信息泄露的风险[3]。相反，分布式在线社交网络(DOSNs)通常基于P2P架构，其中没有控制用户数据的中央服务提供商。事实上，发布在DOSNs上的内容存储在用户提供的设备上，这些设备还协作执行实现预期服务所需的任务。大多数流行的DOSNs，为了帮助用户按照他们的隐私偏好平稳地管理内容共享，允许将用户组织成组。这样，每个用户可以选择只与属于特定组的用户共享内容。缺乏(逻辑上)集中的、第三方管理的、可靠的基础设施来保证内容可用性——无论给定用户是否在线——导致由一个用户发布的内容也存储在其他用户的设备上。实际上，当需要内容时，这样的选择增加了至少一个合作用户设备(和存储在其中的内容)在线的机会。给定上述两个引入的(冲突的)需求:面向组的隐私设置和分布式存储，DOSN的关键特征是发布的内容必须由DOSN基础设施适当地保护，以确保它们只能由具有适当许可(由发布者授予)的用户访问。因此，DOSNs需要有效的解决方案来相对于社交网络的其他用户保护每个用户发布的内容的隐私。虽然已经提出了一些初步的解决方案[1]，但文献缺乏对DOSNs的总体系统化，特别是关于保护访问和确保内容可用性的访问控制模型。当考虑不同模型的利弊时，也可以注意到同样缺乏系统性，尤其是通过性能的角度进行分析时。在本次演讲中，我们调查并比较了当前DOSNs采用的主要内容隐私实施模型。特别是，我们将讨论它们是否适合支持基于不同用户组模型的不同类型的隐私策略。通过实现几个模型并比较它们对于在组上执行的典型操作(即:内容发布、用户加入和离开)的性能来进行评估，从而支持该讨论。此外，我们还强调了当前方法的局限性，并展示了未来的研究方向，以帮助DOSNs成为在线社交网络生态系统中的相关参与者，从而使用户重新控制他们生成的内容。
papers.title_zh: 分散在线社交网络中的内容安全:解决方案、限制和未来之路

papers.title: Keynote Talk - Federated Learning: The Hype, State-of-the-Art and Open Challenges
papers.authors: Nathalie Baracaldo
papers.abstract: The popularity of machine learning models has dramatically increased in a large variety of applications that affect people's daily lifes, including product recommendations, healthcare predictions and critical applications. This wide availability has at the same time raised questions about the trustworthiness, security, and privacy implications of using these systems. While novel technologies and methodologies have been emerging to protect the privacy and security of AI Systems, there are still open challenges that need to be addressed by the research community. Over the past years, my research has focused on the creation of defenses to protect the machine learning pipeline and the design of privacy-aware methodologies to enable the training of accurate machine learning models without transmitting the data to a central place. In this talk, I will focus on data privacy covering a game-changing paradigm known as federated learning [4], which to some extend addresses privacy concerns and regulations that prevent the free transmission and sharing of information. Federated learning is a technology that enables multiple participants owning private data to collaboratively train a single machine learning model while maintaining their training data locally. This is in sharp contrast to traditional machine learning where all data needs to be in a central place. Some argue that federated learning is a privacy-by-design technology given that it does not require data to be transmitted to a central place. However, there are still privacy risks that are relevant in some scenarios. Novel inference attacks that take advantage of the federated learning process have been demonstrated in the literature, resulting in a variety of defenses that aim to reduce these risks. I will present some of these attacks and several cryptographical and differential privacy techniques to deter them, including [5,7,8]. The plethora of defenses is particularly interesting given their diverse threat models and the divergent set of privacy requirements they address. In this talk I will demystify them. I will also explain some challenges related to manipulation attacks [6,9] and machine learning fairness [1] in the context of federated learning. Finally, I will touch upon transparency issues and how to enable accountability for regulated industries [2,3] and vertical federated learning [7]. This talk will go through the security and privacy challenges and solutions in federated learning systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习模型在影响人们日常生活的各种应用中的受欢迎程度显著增加，包括产品推荐、医疗保健预测和关键应用。这种广泛的可用性同时也提出了关于使用这些系统的可信度、安全性和隐私性的问题。虽然新的技术和方法已经出现，以保护人工智能系统的隐私和安全，但仍有开放的挑战需要研究社区解决。在过去的几年里，我的研究一直专注于建立防御措施来保护机器学习管道，以及设计隐私感知方法，以便在不将数据传输到中央位置的情况下，训练准确的机器学习模型。在本次演讲中，我将重点讨论数据隐私，涵盖一种被称为联合学习[4]的改变游戏规则的范式，这在一定程度上解决了隐私问题和阻止信息自由传输和共享的法规。联合学习是一种技术，它使拥有私有数据的多个参与者能够协作训练单个机器学习模型，同时在本地维护他们的训练数据。这与传统的机器学习形成鲜明对比，在传统的机器学习中，所有数据都需要放在一个中心位置。一些人认为联合学习是一种隐私设计技术，因为它不需要将数据传输到一个中心位置。但是，在某些情况下，仍然存在隐私风险。利用联邦学习过程的新颖推理攻击已经在文献中得到证明，导致了旨在降低这些风险的各种防御措施。我将介绍一些这样的攻击和几种密码和差分隐私技术来阻止它们，包括[5，7，8]。考虑到它们不同的威胁模型和不同的隐私要求，过多的防御措施特别有趣。在这次演讲中，我将揭开它们的神秘面纱。我还将解释在联邦学习的背景下与操纵攻击[6，9]和机器学习公平性[1]相关的一些挑战。最后，我将谈到透明度问题，以及如何实现监管行业的问责制[2，3]和纵向联合学习[7]。本次讲座将探讨联合学习系统中的安全和隐私挑战及解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 主题演讲——联合学习:宣传、最新技术和公开挑战

papers.title: Network (In)security: Leniency in Protocols' Design, Code and Configuration
papers.authors: Endadul Hoque
papers.abstract: Protocols are one of the founding pillars of network communication. Given their importance, protocols have received great attention not only from the research community but also from adversaries. Protocols, particularly their implementations, have been lucrative targets for adversarial attacks to induce network insecurity by compromising the guarantees that these implementations should provide. Most of these attacks can be traced back to the leniency in their design, code, or configuration. Finding leniency in implementations is challenging as these lenient instances are primarily tied to the semantics of the protocol and thus demand for techniques unlike existing approaches that we use for finding low-level memory corruption bugs. In this talk, I will discuss our experience and lesson learned in detecting leniency in different layers of the TCP/IP network protocol stack. First, I will show how leniency in the design of loss-based TCP congestion control schemes can be exploited by an attacker to manipulate the victim into taking actions favorable for the attacker. I will introduce our model-guided fuzzing approach to find such manipulation attacks in different TCP implementations part of mainstream operating systems (e.g., Linux, Windows). Next, I will focus on leniency in code, where an implementation exhibits noncompliance with its design. Specifically, I will talk about how lenient implementations of X.509 certificate validation in SSL/TLS libraries can be exploited by an attacker to mount impersonation attacks. Finally, I will highlight that it is not always the protocol's design or code, sometimes it is humans: the users and/or the IT (Information Technology) administrators. Specifically, I will present our multifaceted measurement study where we examined the WPA2-Enterprise Wi-Fi configurations prescribed in tertiary education institutes (TEIs) around the world. I will share our findings about the widespread insecure practices that can leave users of these institutes open to credential theft[2].
papers.abstract_zh: 协议是网络通信的基础之一。鉴于其重要性，协议不仅受到了研究团体的极大关注，也受到了对手的极大关注。协议，尤其是它们的实现，已经成为敌对攻击的有利目标，通过损害这些实现应该提供的保证来诱发网络不安全。这些攻击中的大多数都可以追溯到其设计、代码或配置的宽松。在实现中寻找宽松是具有挑战性的，因为这些宽松的实例主要与协议的语义相关，因此需要不同于现有方法的技术，我们使用现有方法来寻找低级存储器损坏错误。在这次演讲中，我将讨论我们在TCP/IP网络协议栈的不同层中检测宽容性的经验和教训。首先，我将展示攻击者如何利用基于损失的TCP拥塞控制方案设计中的宽容来操纵受害者采取有利于攻击者的行动。我将介绍我们的模型引导的模糊化方法，以在主流操作系统(例如，Linux、Windows)的不同TCP实现中找到这种操纵攻击。接下来，我将关注代码中的宽容，在这种情况下，实现表现出不符合其设计。具体来说，我将讨论SSL/TLS库中X.509证书验证的宽松实现如何被攻击者利用来发起模拟攻击。最后，我要强调的是，并不总是协议的设计或代码，有时是人:用户和/或it(信息技术)管理员。具体来说，我将介绍我们的多方面测量研究，其中我们检查了全球高等教育机构(tei)中规定的WPA2企业Wi-Fi配置。我将分享我们关于广泛存在的不安全做法的发现，这些做法可能会使这些机构的用户容易遭受凭证盗窃[2]。
papers.title_zh: 网络安全:协议设计、编码和配置的宽松

papers.title: Modular Composition of Access Control Policies: A Framework to Build Multi-Site Multi-Level Combinations
papers.authors: Clara Bertolissi, Maribel Fernández
papers.abstract: We present general notions of access control policy composition using the CBAC model. We show that CBAC provides a uniform framework to define compositions of heterogeneous policies (e.g., RBAC and ABAC policies) as required in many practical situations. Compositions can be built both horizontally (where n given policies are combined to define a new policy) and vertically (where policies are extended by adding administration layers). We show that under some conditions on the operations used to build the composition, it is possible to ensure that the result preserves desirable properties (such as liveness and effectiveness). We also discuss mechanisms to detect and eliminate conflicts that may arise when composing policies originating from different sources.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了使用CBAC模型的访问控制策略组合的一般概念。我们表明，CBAC提供了一个统一的框架来定义在许多实际情况下所需的异构政策(如RBAC和ABAC政策)的组成。组合可以在水平方向(n个给定的策略组合起来定义一个新策略)和垂直方向(通过添加管理层来扩展策略)上构建。我们表明，在某些条件下，用于构建组合的操作，有可能确保结果保持理想的性质(如活性和有效性)。我们还讨论了检测和消除冲突的机制，这些冲突可能在组合来自不同来源的策略时出现。
papers.title_zh: 访问控制策略的模块化组合:一种构建多站点多级组合的框架

papers.title: A Study of Application Sandbox Policies in Linux
papers.authors: Trevor Dunlap, William Enck, Bradley Reaves
papers.abstract: Desktop operating systems, including macOS, Windows 10, and Linux, are adopting the application-based security model pervasive in mobile platforms. In Linux, this transition is part of the movement towards two distribution-independent application platforms: Flatpak and Snap. This paper provides the first analysis of sandbox policies defined for Flatpak and Snap applications, covering 283 applications contained in both platforms. First, we find that 90.1% of Snaps and 58.3% of Flatpak applications studied are contained by tamperproof sandboxes. Further, we find evidence that package maintainers actively attempt to define least-privilege application policies. However, defining policy is difficult and error-prone. When studying the set of matching applications that appear in both Flatpak and Snap app stores, we frequently found policy mismatches: e.g., the Flatpak version has a broad privilege (e.g., file access) that the Snap version does not, or vice versa. This work provides confidence that Flatpak and Snap improve Linux platform security while highlighting opportunities for improvement.
papers.abstract_zh: 桌面操作系统，包括macOS、Windows 10和Linux，正在采用移动平台中普遍存在的基于应用的安全模型。在Linux中，这种转变是向两个独立于发行版的应用程序平台发展的一部分:Flatpak和Snap。本文首次分析了为Flatpak和Snap应用程序定义的沙盒策略，涵盖了两个平台中包含的283个应用程序。首先，我们发现所研究的90.1%的Snaps和58.3%的Flatpak应用程序都包含在防篡改沙箱中。此外，我们发现有证据表明，包的维护者积极尝试定义最小特权应用程序策略。然而，定义策略既困难又容易出错。在研究同时出现在Flatpak和Snap应用商店中的一组匹配应用程序时，我们经常发现策略不匹配:例如，Flatpak版本拥有Snap版本没有的广泛权限(例如，文件访问)，反之亦然。这项工作为Flatpak和Snap提高Linux平台安全性提供了信心，同时突出了改进的机会。
papers.title_zh: Linux中应用程序沙盒策略的研究

papers.title: Contemporaneous Update and Enforcement of ABAC Policies
papers.authors: Samir Talegaon, Gunjan Batra, Vijayalakshmi Atluri, Shamik Sural, Jaideep Vaidya
papers.abstract: Access control policies are dynamic in nature, and therefore require frequent updates to synchronize with the latest organizational security requirements. As these updates are handled, it is important that all user access requests be answered contemporaneously and correctly without any interruption or delay. In this paper, considering the context of Attribute Based Access Control (ABAC), we propose an approach that is capable of immediately materializing any update to the policy and ensuring that it is taken into account for any subsequent access requests. One possibility is to update the policy based on the incoming changes through ABAC policy mining techniques. However, it turns out that no existing mining approach can offer correct enforcement of policies when access requests are entertained during the updates. We provide a formal proof for this surprising result and then propose an approach called δwOP that does not suffer from this problem. Essentially, δwOP keeps track of the needed information from updates and uses this in conjunction with the existing ABAC policy rules to make access decisions. We present the complexity analysis as well as a comprehensive experimental evaluation to demonstrate the efficacy of the proposed approach for different types of changes.
papers.abstract_zh: 访问控制策略本质上是动态的，因此需要频繁更新以与最新的组织安全需求保持同步。在处理这些更新时，所有用户访问请求必须同时得到正确响应，不能有任何中断或延迟，这一点很重要。在本文中，考虑到基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)的上下文，我们提出了一种方法，该方法能够立即实现对策略的任何更新，并确保它被考虑到任何后续的访问请求中。一种可能性是通过ABAC策略挖掘技术基于传入的改变来更新策略。然而，事实证明，当在更新期间接受访问请求时，没有现有的挖掘方法能够提供正确的策略实施。我们为这个令人惊讶的结果提供了一个正式的证明，然后提出了一个称为δwOP的方法，它没有这个问题。本质上，δwOP跟踪来自更新的所需信息，并结合现有的ABAC策略规则使用这些信息来做出访问决策。我们提出了复杂性分析以及一个全面的实验评估，以证明所提出的方法对不同类型的变化的有效性。
papers.title_zh: ABAC政策的同期更新和执行

papers.title: WiP: Metamodel for Continuous Authorisation and Usage Control
papers.authors: Ali Hariri, Amjad Ibrahim, Theo Dimitrakos, Bruno Crispo
papers.abstract: Access control has been traditionally used to protect data and privacy. Traditional access control models (e.g., ABAC, RBAC) cannot meet modern security requirements as technologies spread over heterogeneous and dynamic environments that need continuous monitoring. Modern models such as Usage Control (UCON) introduced the concept of continuous authorisation that has a lifecycle consisting of a series of phases through which the authorisation passes during its lifetime. However, such models assume a fixed lifecycle for all authorisations, so they cannot satisfy emerging technologies (e.g., smart vehicles, zero-trust, data flow), which require various and fine-grained lifecycles. Researchers have extended existing models to meet such requirements, but all solutions remain restrictive, as they are specially tailored for specific use-cases. In this paper, we propose an extensible model for continuous authorisations and usage control. The model enables its users to customise and dynamically configure the authorisation lifecycle as required by the use-case. This adds a layer of abstraction, forming a metamodel that can be instantiated into different flavours of continuous authorisation models, each addressing specific requirements. We also show that the authorisation lifecycle can be modelled as Deterministic Finite Automaton (DFA) and expressed in a structured language used by an evaluation engine to dynamically enact and manage the lifecycle. We layout the building blocks of the proposed metamodel and devise future research directions.
papers.abstract_zh: 访问控制传统上用于保护数据和隐私。传统的访问控制模式(如RBAC ABAC)无法满足现代安全需求，因为技术遍布需要持续监控的异构和动态环境。使用控制(UCON)等现代模型引入了持续授权的概念，其生命周期由授权在其生命周期内经历的一系列阶段组成。然而，这种模型假设所有授权都有一个固定的生命周期，因此它们不能满足新兴技术(如智能车辆、零信任、数据流)的需求，这些技术需要不同的细粒度生命周期。研究人员已经扩展了现有的模型来满足这样的要求，但是所有的解决方案仍然是限制性的，因为它们是为特定的用例特别定制的。在本文中，我们提出了一个可扩展的连续授权和使用控制模型。该模型使其用户能够根据用例的要求定制和动态配置授权生命周期。这增加了一个抽象层，形成了一个元模型，该元模型可以实例化为不同风格的连续授权模型，每个模型解决特定的需求。我们还表明，授权生命周期可以建模为确定性有限自动机(DFA ),并以评估引擎使用的结构化语言来表达，以动态制定和管理生命周期。我们规划了元模型的构建模块，并设计了未来的研究方向。
papers.title_zh: WiP:连续授权和使用控制的元模型

papers.title: LARP: A Lightweight Auto-Refreshing Pseudonym Protocol for V2X
papers.authors: Zheng Yang, Tien Tuan Anh Dinh, Chao Yin, Yingying Yao, Dianshi Yang, Xiaolin Chang, Jianying Zhou
papers.abstract: Vehicle-to-everything (V2X) communication is the key enabler for emerging intelligent transportation systems. Applications built on top of V2X require both authentication and privacy protection for the vehicles. The common approach to meet both requirements is to use pseudonyms which are short-term identities. However, both industrial standards and state-of-the-art research are not designed for resource-constrained environments. In addition, they make a strong assumption about the security of the vehicle's on-board computation units. In this paper, we propose a lightweight auto-refreshing pseudonym protocol (LARP) for V2X. LARP supports efficient operations for resource-constrained devices, and provides security even when parts of the vehicle are compromised. We provide formal security proof showing that the protocol is secure. We conduct experiments on a Raspberry Pi 4. The results demonstrate that LARP is feasible and practical.
papers.abstract_zh: 车对物(V2X)通信是新兴智能交通系统的关键推动因素。基于V2X构建的应用程序需要对车辆进行身份验证和隐私保护。满足这两个要求的常见方法是使用假名，即短期身份。然而，工业标准和最先进的研究都不是为资源有限的环境设计的。此外，他们对车辆车载计算单元的安全性做出了强有力的假设。本文提出了一个轻量级的V2X自动刷新假名协议(LARP)。LARP支持资源受限设备的高效运行，即使车辆的某些部件受损也能提供安全保障。我们提供了正式的安全证明，证明该协议是安全的。我们在树莓Pi 4上进行实验。结果表明，LARP是可行和实用的。
papers.title_zh: LARP:一个轻量级的V2X自动刷新假名协议

papers.title: WiP: Verifiable, Secure and Energy-Efficient Private Data Aggregation in Wireless Sensor Networks
papers.authors: Georgia Tsaloli, Alejandro Lancho, Katerina Mitrokotsa, Giuseppe Durisi
papers.abstract: Large amounts of data are collected by IoT devices, and transmitted wirelessly to cloud servers for aggregation. These data are often sensitive and need to remain secret. Moreover, the employed servers might be untrustworthy, and maliciously alter their results. To address this, public verifiability must be provided, i.e., anyone can check the result's correctness. Nevertheless, any such protocol must also cope with the limited battery capacity of the IoT devices. We investigate the problem of verifiable, privacy-preserving aggregation and how to accommodate the IoT energy-efficiency requirements, in the context of a 5G wireless communication setting. We revisit the verifiable additive homomorphic secret sharing (VAHSS), which computes the sum of K sensors' data. We propose a threshold secure and private VAHSS protocol where only a subset of the servers is needed for computing the sum. This sum is publicly verifiable thanks to a proof created during the protocol. We provide an energy efficiency analysis, including the trade-off between the sensors' transmitted power and the protocol's failure probability due to decoding errors in the wireless transmission phase.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网设备收集大量数据，并无线传输到云服务器进行聚合。这些数据通常很敏感，需要保密。此外，所使用的服务器可能是不可信的，并且恶意地改变它们的结果。为了解决这个问题，必须提供公共可验证性，即任何人都可以检查结果的正确性。然而，任何这样的协议还必须应对物联网设备的有限电池容量。我们研究了在5G无线通信环境下，可验证的隐私保护聚合问题，以及如何适应物联网能效要求。我们重新讨论了可验证的加性同态秘密共享(VAHSS ),它计算K个传感器数据的总和。我们提出了一个门限安全和私有的VAHSS协议，其中只需要服务器的子集来计算总和。由于在协议期间创建的证明，这个总数是可公开验证的。我们提供了一个能量效率分析，包括传感器发射功率和由于无线传输阶段解码错误导致的协议失败概率之间的权衡。
papers.title_zh: WiP:无线传感器网络中可验证、安全和节能的私有数据聚合

papers.title: A Game-Theoretically Optimal Defense Paradigm against Traffic Analysis Attacks using Multipath Routing and Deception
papers.authors: Masoumeh Abolfathi, Ilan Shomorony, Alireza Vahid, Jafar Haadi Jafarian
papers.abstract: While encryption can protect network traffic against simple on-path eavesdropping attacks, it cannot prevent sophisticated traffic analysis (TA) attacks from inferring sensitive information. TA attackers utilize machine learning algorithms to learn the traffic patterns of a communication (e.g., a website visit) and then use these learned patterns to accurately identify similar communications (which website is being visited by a targeted user), even though packets are encrypted. In this paper, we propose a novel and effective defense approach to protect users' privacy against TA attacks. The proposed approach is based on two proactive defense paradigms: multipath routing and deception. The route randomization strategy distributes packets of a flow on multiple paths between a source and destination to restrict the amount of traffic that a TA adversary can collect from a flow. The deception strategy augments the randomization strategy by injecting fake packets among the real packets of a flow on different paths. Our focal research problem is to identify the optimal strategies for how real and fake packets must be distributed on multiple paths with different capacities to achieve maximum effectiveness against TA attacks. We formalize the problem as a zero-sum game and show that the water-filling distribution of real and fake packets provides an optimal defense solution. Through theoretical and experimental studies, we demonstrate that the proposed approach can significantly degrade the accuracy of the TA attacks. Unlike other defensive approaches in the literature, our approach works without manipulating the production traffic (e.g., delaying packets or padding), or requiring any real-time information about the protected traffic flows.
papers.abstract_zh: 虽然加密可以保护网络流量免受简单的路径窃听攻击，但它无法防止复杂的流量分析(TA)攻击推断敏感信息。TA攻击者利用机器学习算法来学习通信的流量模式(例如，网站访问)，然后使用这些学习到的模式来准确识别类似的通信(目标用户正在访问哪个网站)，即使数据包是加密的。在这篇论文中，我们提出了一个新的有效的防御方法来保护用户的隐私免受TA攻击。所提出的方法基于两种主动防御范例:多路径路由和欺骗。路由随机化策略将流的数据包分布在源和目的地之间的多条路径上，以限制t a对手可以从流中收集的流量。欺骗策略通过在不同路径上的流的真实分组中注入虚假分组来增强随机化策略。我们的重点研究问题是确定如何在具有不同容量的多条路径上分发真实和虚假分组的最佳策略，以实现对TA攻击的最大有效性。我们将该问题形式化为一个零和博弈，并证明真假数据包的注水分布提供了一个最优的防御方案。通过理论和实验研究，我们证明了所提出的方法可以显著降低TA攻击的准确性。与文献中的其他防御方法不同，我们的方法不需要操纵生产流量(例如，延迟数据包或填充)，也不需要关于受保护流量的任何实时信息。
papers.title_zh: 利用多路径路由和欺骗对抗流量分析攻击的博弈理论最优防御范式

papers.title: Harpocrates: Anonymous Data Publication in Named Data Networking
papers.authors: Md Washik Al Azad, Reza Tourani, Abderrahmen Mtibaa, Spyridon Mastorakis
papers.abstract: Named-Data Networking (NDN), a realization of the Information-Centric Networking (ICN) vision, offers a request-response communication model where data is identified based on application-defined names at the network layer. This amplifies the ability of censoring authorities to restrict access to certain data/websites/applications and monitor user requests. The majority of existing NDN-based frameworks have focused on enabling users in a censoring network to access data available outside of this network, without considering how data producers in a censoring network can make their data available to users outside of this network. This problem becomes especially challenging, since the NDN communication paths are symmetric, while producers are mandated to sign the data they generate and identify their certificates. In this paper, we propose Harpocrates, an NDN-based framework for anonymous data publication under censorship conditions. Harpocrates enables producers in censoring networks to produce and make their data available to users outside of these networks while remaining anonymous to censoring authorities. Our evaluation demonstrates that Harpocrates achieves anonymous data publication under different settings, being able to identify and adapt to censoring actions.
papers.abstract_zh: 命名数据网络(NDN)是以信息为中心的网络(ICN)愿景的一种实现，它提供了一种请求-响应通信模型，在这种模型中，数据是根据网络层应用程序定义的名称来识别的。这增强了审查机构限制访问某些数据/网站/应用程序和监控用户请求的能力。大多数现有的基于NDN的框架集中于使审查网络中的用户能够访问该网络之外的可用数据，而没有考虑审查网络中的数据生产者如何使其数据对该网络之外的用户可用。这个问题变得特别具有挑战性，因为NDN通信路径是对称的，而生产者被要求签署他们生成的数据并识别他们的证书。在本文中，我们提出了Harpocrates，一个基于NDN的在审查条件下匿名数据发布的框架。Harpocrates使审查网络中的生产者能够生产并向这些网络之外的用户提供他们的数据，同时对审查当局保持匿名。我们的评估表明，Harpocrates实现了不同设置下的匿名数据发布，能够识别和适应审查行为。
papers.title_zh: Harpocrates:命名数据网络中的匿名数据发布

papers.title: Generalized Noise Role Mining
papers.authors: Jason Crampton, Eduard Eiben, Gregory Z. Gutin, Daniel Karapetyan, Diptapriyo Majumdar
papers.abstract: Role mining seeks to compute a set of roles R, a user-role authorization relation UA and a permission-role authorization relation PA, given a user-permission authorization relation UPA, and is therefore a core problem in the specification of role-based authorization policies. Role mining is known to be hard in general and exact solutions are often impossible to obtain, so there exists an extensive literature on variants of the role mining problem that seek to find approximate solutions and algorithms that use heuristics to find reasonable solutions efficiently. In this paper, we introduce the Generalized Noise Role Mining problem (GNRM) - a generalization of the MinNoise Role Mining problem - which we believe has considerable practical relevance. In particular, GNRM can produce "security-aware" or "availability-aware" solutions. Extending work of Fomin et al., we show that GNRM is fixed parameter tractable, with parameter r + k, where r is the number of roles in the solution and k is the number of discrepancies between UPA and the relation defined by the composition of UA and PA. We also introduce a further variant of GNRM in which the accuracy of the solution is defined by the number of users and permissions that are affected, rather than the number of individual discrepancies k. We show that this variant of GNRM is also fixed-parameter tractable. We then report the results of our experimental work using general-purpose solvers to solve instances of GNRM. Our key findings are that security-aware role mining seems to be easier than availability-aware role mining, based on reasonable assumptions about UPA, and security-aware role mining introduces a similar number of discrepancies to MinNoise role mining.
papers.abstract_zh: 角色挖掘寻求在给定用户-权限授权关系UPA的情况下计算一组角色R、用户-角色授权关系UA和权限-角色授权关系PA，因此是基于角色的授权策略规范中的核心问题。众所周知，角色挖掘通常是困难的，并且精确的解决方案通常是不可能获得的，因此存在大量关于角色挖掘问题的变体的文献，这些变体寻求找到近似的解决方案，并且存在使用启发式算法来有效地找到合理的解决方案的算法。在本文中，我们介绍了广义噪声角色挖掘问题(GNRM)，它是MinNoise角色挖掘问题的一个推广，我们认为它具有相当大的实际意义。特别是，GNRM可以产生“安全感知”或“可用性感知”的解决方案。扩展了Fomin等人的工作，我们证明了GNRM是固定参数易处理的，参数为r + k，其中r是解中角色的数目，k是UPA与由UA和PA的组合定义的关系之间的差异的数目。我们还介绍了GNRM的另一种变体，其中解决方案的准确性由受影响的用户和权限的数量来定义，而不是由个体差异的数量k来定义。我们表明GNRM的这种变体也是固定参数易处理的。然后，我们报告了使用通用解算器求解GNRM实例的实验结果。我们的主要发现是，基于对UPA的合理假设，安全感知角色挖掘似乎比可用性感知角色挖掘更容易，并且安全感知角色挖掘引入了与MinNoise角色挖掘类似数量的差异。
papers.title_zh: 广义噪声角色挖掘

papers.title: Towards a Theory on Testing XACML Policies
papers.authors: Dianxiang Xu, Roshan Shrestha, Ning Shen, Yunpeng Zhang
papers.abstract: Policy testing is an important means for quality assurance of access control policies. Experimental studies on the testing methods of XACML policies have shown their varying levels of effectiveness. However, there is a lack of explanation for why they are unable to detect certain types of faults. It is unclear what is essential to the fault detection capability. To address this issue, we propose a theory on policy testing by formalizing the fault detection conditions with respect to a comprehensive fault model of XACML policies. The detection condition of a policy fault, composed of the reachability, necessity, and propagation constraints, is sufficient and necessary for revealing the fault. The formalized fault detection conditions can qualify the inherent strengths and limitations of testing methods. We have applied the formalization to the qualitative evaluations of five testing methods for the current version of the XACML standard. The results show that, for each method, there are certain types of faults that can always or never be revealed, while the detection of other faults may depend on the particular policy structure.
papers.abstract_zh: 策略测试是访问控制策略质量保证的重要手段。对XACML策略测试方法的实验研究显示了它们不同程度的有效性。然而，缺乏对它们为什么不能检测某些类型的故障的解释。不清楚故障检测能力的本质是什么。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种策略测试理论，通过形式化XACML策略的综合故障模型的故障检测条件。策略错误的检测条件由可达性、必要性和传播约束组成，是揭示错误的充分必要条件。形式化的故障检测条件可以限定测试方法的内在优势和局限性。我们已经将形式化应用于XACML标准当前版本的五种测试方法的定性评估。结果表明，对于每种方法，都有某些类型的错误总是可以或永远不会被发现，而其他错误的检测可能取决于特定的策略结构。
papers.title_zh: 关于测试XACML策略的理论

papers.title: The Secrecy Resilience of Access Control Policies and Its Application to Role Mining
papers.authors: Qiang Guo, Mahesh Tripunitara
papers.abstract: We propose a notion that we call the secrecy resilience of an access control policy that, to our knowledge, has not been explored in prior work. We seek to capture with this notion the property inherent to an access control policy that measures its resistance to disclosure. We motivate and then propose a definition for secrecy resilience that is based on the notion of entropy from information theory. We focus on policies expressed in Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), and contrast RBAC from the access matrix from the standpoint of secrecy resilience. We observe that similar to other objectives such as the minimization of the number of roles, an RBAC policy with the best secrecy resilience can be a desirable objective of bottom-up role-mining, with which we seek to compute an RBAC policy given as input an access matrix. We have carried out an empirical assessment of several role-mining algorithms from the standpoint of secrecy resilience for two underlying distribution-events pairs each of which captures a kind of best-case from the standpoint of a defender. Towards carrying out the empirical assessment, we make an additional contribution to role-mining: we propose new reductions for the two problems of minimizing the number of roles and the number of edges, and discuss the manner in which our reductions are superior to reductions in existing work.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个概念，我们称之为访问控制策略的保密弹性，据我们所知，在以前的工作中没有探索过。我们试图用这个概念来捕捉访问控制策略固有的属性，该属性测量其对公开的抵抗力。我们基于信息论中熵的概念，提出了保密弹性的定义。我们关注基于角色的访问控制(RBAC)中表达的策略，并从保密弹性的角度对比访问矩阵中的RBAC。我们观察到，类似于诸如最小化角色数量的其他目标，具有最佳保密弹性的RBAC策略可以是自底向上角色挖掘的期望目标，利用该目标，我们寻求计算给定访问矩阵作为输入的RBAC策略。我们从保密弹性的角度对两个底层分布事件对的几个角色挖掘算法进行了经验评估，每个分布事件对从防御者的角度捕捉一种最佳情况。为了进行实证评估，我们对角色挖掘作出了额外的贡献:我们对最小化角色数和边数这两个问题提出了新的约简，并讨论了我们的约简优于现有工作中的约简的方式。
papers.title_zh: 访问控制策略的保密弹性及其在角色挖掘中的应用

papers.title: Effective Evaluation of Relationship-Based Access Control Policy Mining
papers.authors: Padmavathi Iyer, Amirreza Masoumzadeh
papers.abstract: Mining algorithms for relationship-based access control policies produce policies composed of relationship-based patterns that justify the input authorizations according to a given system graph. The correct functioning of a policy mining algorithm is typically tested based on experimental evaluations, in each of which the miner is presented with a set of authorizations and a system graph, and is expected to produce the corresponding ground truth policy. In this paper, we propose formal properties that must exist between the system graph and the ground truth policy in an evaluation test so that the miner is challenged to produce the exact ground truth policy. We show that failure to verify these properties in the experiment leads to inadequate evaluation, i.e., not truly testing whether the miner can handle the complexity of the ground truth policy. We also argue that following these properties would provide a computational advantage in the evaluations. We propose algorithms to identify and correct violations of these properties in system graphs. We also present our observations regarding these properties and their enforcement using a set of experimental studies.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于关系的访问控制策略的挖掘算法产生由基于关系的模式组成的策略，这些模式根据给定的系统图来证明输入授权的合理性。策略挖掘算法的正确运行通常基于实验评估来测试，在每个实验评估中，挖掘器被呈现一组授权和系统图，并且被期望产生相应的基本事实策略。在本文中，我们提出了在评估测试中系统图和基础真值策略之间必须存在的形式属性，使得挖掘器被挑战以产生精确的基础真值策略。我们表明，在实验中未能验证这些属性会导致评估不充分，即没有真正测试矿工是否能够处理地面真相策略的复杂性。我们还认为，遵循这些性质将在评估中提供计算优势。我们提出算法，以确定和纠正违反这些性质的系统图。我们也提出了我们的观察关于这些性质和他们的执行使用一套实验研究。
papers.title_zh: 基于关系的访问控制策略挖掘的有效性评估

papers.title: "Why would Someone Hack Me out of Thousands of Students": Video Presenter's Impact on Motivating Users to Adopt 2FA
papers.authors: Elham Al Qahtani, Lipsarani Sahoo, Yousra Javed, Mohamed Shehab
papers.abstract: The voluntary adoption rate of two-factor authentication (2FA) remains low. This paper investigates whether video-based risk communication messages about Duo 2FA impacts voluntary 2FA adoption rate when delivered by a human speaker versus a cartoon speaker. We conducted an online two-phased survey-based study with 435 university students comprised of those who have not enabled Duo 2FA (non-adopters) on their university account as well as those who had previously enabled Duo 2FA (adopters). Participants in the non-adopters group (139) were assigned to one of the three groups: Threat-R (human speaker video), Threat-A (cartoon speaker video), and Control (no video). We found that 31% of participants enabled Duo 2FA through the human speaker video message compared to 7% with the cartoon speaker video message. However, there was no significant difference between the treatment and control groups (17% of participants enabled Duo 2FA in the Control group). Nevertheless, the treatment group participants showed their intention to activate Duo 2FA on their university account in the future. Those who enabled Duo 2FA rated Duo's usability as good. Moreover, enabling Duo 2FA on university accounts led some participants to enable 2FA on other online accounts. Our findings suggest that risk communication through videos that have a human speaker could increase users' willingness to adopt security features.
papers.abstract_zh: 双因素身份认证(2FA)的自愿采用率仍然很低。本文研究了基于视频的关于Duo 2FA的风险沟通信息在由真人演讲者和卡通演讲者发表时是否会影响2FA的自愿采用率。我们对435名大学生进行了一项基于调查的在线两阶段研究，这些大学生包括尚未在其大学帐户上启用Duo 2FA(非采纳者)的人以及之前已启用Duo 2FA(采纳者)的人。非采纳者组(139人)的参与者被分配到三组中的一组:威胁-R(真人说话视频)、威胁-A(卡通说话视频)和控制组(无视频)。我们发现，31%的参与者通过真人讲话视频信息启用Duo 2FA，相比之下，7%的参与者通过卡通讲话视频信息启用Duo 2FA。然而，治疗组和对照组之间没有显著差异(对照组中17%的参与者启用了Duo 2FA)。尽管如此，治疗组的参与者表现出他们打算在将来激活他们大学账户上的Duo 2FA。那些启用Duo 2FA的人将Duo的可用性评为良好。此外，在大学账户上启用Duo 2FA导致一些参与者在其他在线账户上启用2FA。我们的研究结果表明，通过有真人说话的视频进行风险沟通可以增加用户采用安全功能的意愿。
papers.title_zh: “为什么有人会从成千上万的学生中黑掉我”:视频演示者对激励用户采用2FA的影响

papers.title: Removing the Reliance on Perimeters for Security using Network Views
papers.authors: Iffat Anjum, Daniel Kostecki, Ethan Leba, Jessica Sokal, Rajit Bharambe, William Enck, Cristina Nita-Rotaru, Bradley Reaves
papers.abstract: Traditional enterprise security relies on network perimeters to define and enforce network security policies. Emerging application-focused Zero Trust architectures attempt to address this long-standing challenge by moving business applications to the cloud and performing enhanced identity and access control checks within a web gateway. However, these solutions ignore the security needs of workstations, development servers, and device management interfaces. In this work, we propose Network Views (abbrev. NetViews) for least-privilege network access control where each host has a different, limited view of the other hosts and services within a network. We present an SDN-based design and demonstrate that our implementation has network latency and throughput comparable to baseline reactive forwarding. We further provide an optimization for multi-connection flows that significantly reduces both redundant access control checks and forwarding state storage in switches. As such, NetViews provides a practical primitive for removing the reliance on security perimeters within enterprise networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统的企业安全依赖于网络边界来定义和实施网络安全策略。新兴的以应用为中心的零信任架构试图通过将业务应用移至云并在web网关内执行增强的身份和访问控制检查来解决这一长期挑战。然而，这些解决方案忽略了工作站、开发服务器和设备管理界面的安全需求。在这项工作中，我们提出了网络视图。NetViews)用于最低权限的网络访问控制，其中每台主机对网络中的其他主机和服务都有不同的有限视图。我们展示了一个基于SDN的设计，并证明我们的实施具有与基线反应式转发相当的网络延迟和吞吐量。我们还针对多连接流进行了优化，显著减少了冗余访问控制检查和交换机中的转发状态存储。因此，NetViews为消除企业网络中对安全边界的依赖提供了一个实用的原语。
papers.title_zh: 使用网络视图消除对外围安全的依赖

papers.title: BlueSky: Physical Access Control: Characteristics, Challenges, and Research Opportunities
papers.authors: Amirreza Masoumzadeh, Hans van der Laan, Albert Dercksen
papers.abstract: Physical access control (PAC) is an integral part of the physical security system of any organization. However, despite the size of the PAC industry and its importance in securing our physical environments, public research and development regarding PAC are limited. This paper aims to lower the barriers for the access control research community to explore and engage in the research opportunities regarding PAC systems. We characterize PAC systems and present an access control architecture that captures their central concepts, such as physical space models and different levels of policies, and processes such as policy conversion, enforcement, and analysis. We discuss how PAC can be distinguished from logical access control (LAC), which is applicable to cyber environments. We also present several unique challenges and research opportunities that the PAC domain introduces.
papers.abstract_zh: 物理访问控制(PAC)是任何组织的物理安全系统不可或缺的一部分。然而，尽管PAC行业的规模及其在保护我们的物理环境方面的重要性，但关于PAC的公共研究和开发是有限的。本文旨在降低访问控制研究社区探索和参与关于PAC系统的研究机会的障碍。我们描述了PAC系统的特征，并提出了一个访问控制体系结构，该体系结构捕获了它们的中心概念，如物理空间模型和不同级别的策略，以及诸如策略转换、实施和分析等过程。我们讨论如何将PAC与适用于网络环境的逻辑访问控制(LAC)区分开来。我们还提出了几个独特的挑战和研究机会的PAC领域介绍。
papers.title_zh: 蓝天:物理访问控制:特点、挑战和研究机会

papers.title: FairRoad: Achieving Fairness for Recommender Systems with Optimized Antidote Data
papers.authors: Minghong Fang, Jia Liu, Michinari Momma, Yi Sun
papers.abstract: Today, recommender systems have played an increasingly important role in shaping our experiences of digital environments and social interactions. However, as recommender systems become ubiquitous in our society, recent years have also witnessed significant fairness concerns for recommender systems. Specifically, studies have shown that recommender systems may inherit or even amplify biases from historical data, and as a result, provide unfair recommendations. To address fairness risks in recommender systems, most of the previous approaches to date are focused on modifying either the existing training data samples or the deployed recommender algorithms, but unfortunately with limited degrees of success. In this paper, we propose a new approach called fair recommendation with optimized antidote data (FairRoad), which aims to improve the fairness performances of recommender systems through the construction of a small and carefully crafted antidote dataset. Toward this end, we formulate our antidote data generation task as a mathematical optimization problem, which minimizes the unfairness of the targeted recommender systems while not disrupting the deployed recommendation algorithms. Extensive experiments show that our proposed antidote data generation algorithm significantly improve the fairness of recommender systems with a small amounts of antidote data.
papers.abstract_zh: 今天，推荐系统在塑造我们的数字环境和社交体验方面发挥着越来越重要的作用。然而，随着推荐系统在我们的社会中变得无处不在，近年来推荐系统的公平性也受到了极大的关注。具体来说，研究表明，推荐系统可能会继承甚至放大历史数据中的偏见，从而提供不公平的推荐。为了解决推荐系统中的公平性风险，迄今为止，大多数先前的方法集中于修改现有的训练数据样本或部署的推荐算法，但不幸的是，成功的程度有限。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的方法，称为优化解毒剂数据的公平推荐(FairRoad ),旨在通过构建一个小的精心制作的解毒剂数据集来提高推荐系统的公平性能。为此，我们将解毒剂数据生成任务公式化为一个数学优化问题，它最小化了目标推荐系统的不公平性，同时不中断部署的推荐算法。大量实验表明，我们提出的解毒剂数据生成算法显著提高了推荐系统在少量解毒剂数据情况下的公平性。
papers.title_zh: FairRoad:用优化的解药数据实现推荐系统的公平性

papers.title: BlueSky: Combining Task Planning and Activity-Centric Access Control for Assistive Humanoid Robots
papers.authors: Saskia Bayreuther, Florian Jacob, Markus Grotz, Rainer Kartmann, Fabian Peller-Konrad, Fabian Paus, Hannes Hartenstein, Tamim Asfour
papers.abstract: In the not too distant future, assistive humanoid robots will provide versatile assistance for coping with everyday life. In their interactions with humans, not only safety, but also security and privacy issues need to be considered. In this Blue Sky paper, we therefore argue that it is time to bring task planning and execution as a well-established field of robotics with access and usage control in the field of security and privacy closer together. In particular, the recently proposed activity-based view on access and usage control provides a promising approach to bridge the gap between these two perspectives. We argue that humanoid robots provide for specific challenges due to their task-universality and their use in both, private and public spaces. Furthermore, they are socially connected to various parties and require policy creation at runtime due to learning. We contribute first attempts on the architecture and enforcement layer as well as on joint modeling, and discuss challenges and a research roadmap also for the policy and objectives layer. We conclude that the underlying combination of decentralized systems' and smart environments' research aspects provides for a rich source of challenges that need to be addressed on the road to deployment.
papers.abstract_zh: 在不久的将来，辅助人形机器人将为应对日常生活提供多方面的帮助。在他们与人类的互动中，不仅需要考虑安全性，还需要考虑安全和隐私问题。因此，在这篇蓝天论文中，我们认为是时候将任务规划和执行作为一个成熟的机器人领域，与安全和隐私领域的访问和使用控制更紧密地结合在一起了。特别是，最近提出的基于活动的访问和使用控制观点为弥合这两种观点之间的差距提供了一种有希望的方法。我们认为，人形机器人提供了特殊的挑战，因为它们的任务普遍性和它们在私人和公共空间的使用。此外，它们在社交上与各方相连，并且由于学习而需要在运行时创建策略。我们首先尝试了架构和执行层以及联合建模，并讨论了策略和目标层的挑战和研究路线图。我们的结论是，分散系统和智能环境研究方面的基本组合提供了在部署过程中需要解决的大量挑战。
papers.title_zh: BlueSky:结合辅助类人机器人的任务规划和以活动为中心的访问控制

papers.title: A Capability-based Distributed Authorization System to Enforce Context-aware Permission Sequences
papers.authors: Adrian Shuai Li, Reihaneh Safavi-Naini, Philip W. L. Fong
papers.abstract: Controlled sharing is fundamental to distributed systems. We consider a capability-based distributed authorization system where a client receives capabilities (access tokens) from an authorization server to access the resources of resource servers. Capability-based authorization systems have been widely used on the Web, in mobile applications and other distributed systems. A common requirement of such systems is that the user uses tokens of multiple servers in a particular order. A related requirement is the token may be used if certain environmental conditions hold. We introduce a secure capability-based system that supports "permission sequence" and "context". This allows a finite sequence of permissions to be enforced, each with their own specific context. We prove the safety property of this system for these conditions and integrate the system into OAuth 2.0 with proof-of-possession tokens. We evaluate our implementation and compare it with plain OAuth with respect to the average time for obtaining an authorization token and acquiring access to the resource.
papers.abstract_zh: 受控共享是分布式系统的基础。我们考虑一个基于能力的分布式授权系统，其中客户端从授权服务器接收能力(访问令牌)来访问资源服务器的资源。基于能力的授权系统已经广泛应用于Web、移动应用和其他分布式系统中。这种系统的共同要求是用户以特定的顺序使用多个服务器的令牌。一个相关的要求是，如果某些环境条件成立，可以使用令牌。我们引入了一个支持“许可序列”和“上下文”的安全的基于能力的系统。这允许执行有限的权限序列，每个权限都有自己特定的上下文。我们证明了该系统在这些条件下的安全性，并将该系统集成到OAuth 2.0中。我们评估了我们的实现，并将其与普通OAuth在获取授权令牌和获得资源访问权的平均时间方面进行了比较。
papers.title_zh: 基于能力的分布式授权系统实施上下文感知的权限序列

papers.title: BlueSky: Activity Control: A Vision for "Active" Security Models for Smart Collaborative Systems
papers.authors: Tanjila Mawla, Maanak Gupta, Ravi S. Sandhu
papers.abstract: Cyber physical ecosystem connects different intelligent devices over heterogeneous networks. Various operations are performed on smart objects to ensure efficiency and to support automation in smart environments. An Activity (defined by Gupta and Sandhu) reflects the current state of an object, which changes in response to requested operations. Due to multiple running activities on different objects, it is critical to secure collaborative systems considering run-time decisions impacted due to related activities (and other parameters) supporting active enforcement of access control decision. Recently, Gupta and Sandhu proposed Activity-Centric Access Control (ACAC) and discussed the notion of activity as a prime abstraction for access control in collaborative systems. The model provides an active security approach that considers activity decision factors such as authorizations, obligations, conditions, and dependencies among related device activities. This paper takes a step forward and presents the core components of an ACAC model and compares with other security models differentiating novel properties of ACAC. We highlight how existing models do not (or in limited scope) support 'active' decision and enforcement of authorization in collaborative systems. We propose a hierarchical structure for a family of ACAC models by gradually adding the properties related to notion of activity and discuss states of an activity. We highlight the convergence of ACAC with Zero Trust tenets to reflect how ACAC supports necessary security posture of distributed and connected smart ecosystems. This paper aims to gain a better understanding of ACAC in collaborative systems supporting novel abstractions, properties and requirements.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络物理生态系统通过异构网络连接不同的智能设备。对智能对象执行各种操作，以确保效率并支持智能环境中的自动化。一个活动(由古普塔和桑德胡定义)反映了一个对象的当前状态，它响应请求的操作而改变。由于不同对象上的多个运行活动，考虑到由于支持主动执行访问控制决策的相关活动(和其他参数)而影响的运行时决策，保护协作系统是至关重要的。最近，古普塔和桑德胡提出了以活动为中心的访问控制(ACAC ),并讨论了活动作为协作系统中访问控制的主要抽象的概念。该模型提供了一种主动安全方法，该方法考虑了活动决策因素，例如授权、义务、条件以及相关设备活动之间的依赖性。本文向前迈进了一步，介绍了ACAC模型的核心组件，并与其他安全模型进行了比较，区分了ACAC的新特性。我们强调了现有模型如何不支持(或在有限的范围内)协作系统中的“主动”决策和授权实施。我们提出了一个ACAC模型家族的层次结构，通过逐渐增加与活动概念相关的属性，并讨论了活动的状态。我们强调ACAC与零信任原则的融合，以反映ACAC如何支持分布式和互联智能生态系统的必要安全态势。本文旨在更好地理解支持新颖抽象、属性和需求的协作系统中的ACAC。
papers.title_zh: 蓝天:活动控制:智能协作系统“主动”安全模型的愿景

papers.title: WiP: AABAC - Automated Attribute Based Access Control for Genomics Data
papers.authors: David Reddick, Justin Presley, Frank Alex Feltus, Susmit Shannigrahi
papers.abstract: The COVID-19 crisis and the subsequent vaccine development have demonstrated the potential of cutting-edge genomics research. However, the privacy of these sensitive pieces of information is an area of significant concern for genomics researchers. The current security models make it difficult to create flexible, automated, and secure data-sharing frameworks. These models also increase the complexity of adding or revoking access. In this work, we investigate an automated attribute-based access control (AABAC) model for genomics data over Named Data Networking (NDN). AABAC secures the data itself rather than the storage location or transmission channel, provides automated data invalidation, and automates key retrieval and data validation while maintaining the ability to control access. When combined with NDN, we show that AABAC offers a secure and flexible access control framework.
papers.abstract_zh: 新冠肺炎危机和随后的疫苗开发证明了前沿基因组学研究的潜力。然而，这些敏感信息的隐私是基因组研究人员非常关注的领域。当前的安全模型使得创建灵活、自动化和安全的数据共享框架变得困难。这些模型也增加了添加或撤销访问的复杂性。在这项工作中，我们研究了一个自动化的基于属性的访问控制(AABAC)模型，用于命名数据网络(NDN)上的基因组数据。AABAC保护数据本身，而不是存储位置或传输通道，提供自动数据失效，并自动进行密钥检索和数据验证，同时保持控制访问的能力。当与NDN结合时，我们表明AABAC提供了一个安全和灵活的访问控制框架。
papers.title_zh: WiP:aa BAC——基因组数据基于属性的自动化访问控制

papers.title: Higher-Order Relationship-Based Access Control: A Temporal Instantiation with IoT Applications
papers.authors: Chahal Arora, Syed Zain R. Rizvi, Philip W. L. Fong
papers.abstract: Cyberphysical systems involve connected devices that are physically embedded. These devices enter into transient relationships with one another and with the environment. We propose an access control model, HO(T)-ReBAC, for facilitating access control in such dynamic environments. Specifically, HO(T)-ReBAC bases its authorization decisions on the history of relationship changes. We demonstrate the usefulness of this model in a case study on a Medical Internet-of-Things application. We extend a recently proposed graph matching algorithm to handle temporality in our model, thereby yielding an efficient authorization mechanism, the performance of which has been evaluated empirically. This model is the first instantiation of a general idea, Higher-Order Relationship-Based Access Control, that we have been developing.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络物理系统包括物理嵌入的连接设备。这些设备彼此之间以及与环境之间存在短暂的关系。我们提出了一个访问控制模型HO(T)-ReBAC，用于在这样的动态环境中促进访问控制。具体来说，HO(T)-ReBAC将其授权决策基于关系变化的历史。我们在一个医疗物联网应用的案例研究中展示了该模型的有效性。我们扩展了一个最近提出的图匹配算法来处理我们的模型中的时间性，从而产生一个有效的授权机制，其性能已经过经验评估。这个模型是我们一直在开发的基于高阶关系的访问控制的第一个实例。
papers.title_zh: 基于高阶关系的访问控制:物联网应用的时间实例化

papers.title: BlueSky: Towards Convergence of Zero Trust Principles and Score-Based Authorization for IoT Enabled Smart Systems
papers.authors: Safwa Ameer, Maanak Gupta, Smriti Bhatt, Ravi S. Sandhu
papers.abstract: Zero trust (ZT) is the term for an evolving set of cybersecurity paradigms that move defenses from static, network-based perimeters to focus on users, assets, and resources. It assumes no implicit trust is granted to assets or user accounts based solely on their physical or network location. We have billions of devices in IoT ecosystems connected to enable smart environments, and these devices are scattered around different locations, sometimes multiple cities or even multiple countries. Moreover, the deployment of resource-constrained devices motivates the integration of IoT and cloud services. This adoption of a plethora of technologies expands the attack surface and positions the IoT ecosystem as a target for many potential security threats. This complexity has outstripped legacy perimeter-based security methods as there is no single, easily identified perimeter for different use cases in IoT. Hence, we believe that the need arises to incorporate ZT guiding principles in workflows, systems design, and operations that can be used to improve the security posture of IoT applications. This paper motivates the need to implement ZT principles when developing access control models for smart IoT systems. It first provides a structured mapping between the ZT basic tenets and the PEI framework when designing and implementing a ZT authorization system. It proposes the ZT authorization requirements framework (ZT-ARF), which provides a structured approach to authorization policy models in ZT systems. Moreover, it analyzes the requirements of access control models in IoT within the proposed ZT-ARF and presents the vision and need for a ZT score-based authorization framework (ZT-SAF) that is capable of maintaining the access control requirements for ZT IoT connected systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 零信任(ZT)是一组不断发展的网络安全范例的术语，这些范例将防御从基于网络的静态边界转移到关注用户、资产和资源。它假定不会仅基于资产或用户帐户的物理或网络位置向其授予隐式信任。我们在物联网生态系统中有数十亿台设备连接在一起，以实现智能环境，这些设备分散在不同的位置，有时是多个城市甚至多个国家。此外，资源受限设备的部署推动了物联网和云服务的集成。这种对过多技术的采用扩大了攻击面，并将物联网生态系统定位为许多潜在安全威胁的目标。这种复杂性已经超过了传统的基于边界的安全方法，因为对于物联网中的不同使用情形，没有单一的、易于识别的边界。因此，我们认为有必要将ZT指导原则融入工作流、系统设计和运营中，以提高物联网应用的安全状况。本文阐述了在开发智能物联网系统的访问控制模型时，实施ZT原则的必要性。在设计和实现ZT授权系统时，它首先提供了ZT基本原则和PEI框架之间的结构化映射。它提出了ZT授权需求框架(ZT-ARF)，为ZT系统中的授权策略模型提供了一种结构化的方法。此外，它分析了提议的ZT-东盟区域论坛中物联网访问控制模型的要求，并提出了基于ZT分数的授权框架(ZT-SAF)的愿景和需求，该框架能够维持ZT物联网连接系统的访问控制要求。
papers.title_zh: 蓝天:实现物联网智能系统零信任原则和基于分数授权的融合

papers.title: WiP: The Intrinsic Dimensionality of IoT Networks
papers.authors: Matt Gorbett, Hossein Shirazi, Indrakshi Ray
papers.abstract: The Internet of Things (IoT) is revolutionizing society by connecting people and devices seamlessly and providing enhanced user experience and functionalities. However, the unique properties of IoT networks, such as heterogeneity and non-standardized protocol, have created critical security holes and network mismanagement. We propose a new measurement tool for IoT network data to aid in analyzing and classifying such network traffic. We use evidence from both security and machine learning research, which suggests that the complexity of a dataset can be used as a metric to determine the trustworthiness of data. We test the complexity of IoT networks using Intrinsic Dimensionality (ID), a theoretical complexity measurement based on the observation that a few variables can often describe high dimensional datasets. We use ID to evaluate four modern IoT network datasets empirically, showing that, for network and device-level data generated using IoT methodologies, the ID of the data fits into a low dimensional representation; this makes such data amenable to the use of machine learning algorithms for anomaly detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)通过无缝连接人和设备，并提供增强的用户体验和功能，正在彻底改变社会。然而，物联网网络的独特属性，如异构性和非标准化协议，已经造成了严重的安全漏洞和网络管理不善。我们提出了一种新的物联网网络数据测量工具，以帮助分析和分类此类网络流量。我们使用来自安全和机器学习研究的证据，这表明数据集的复杂性可以用作确定数据可信度的指标。我们使用固有维度(ID)测试物联网网络的复杂性，固有维度是一种理论上的复杂性测量方法，基于少数变量通常可以描述高维数据集的观察结果。我们使用ID对四个现代物联网网络数据集进行了经验评估，表明对于使用物联网方法生成的网络和设备级数据，数据的ID适合低维表示；这使得这种数据可以使用机器学习算法进行异常检测。
papers.title_zh: WiP:物联网网络的内在维度

papers.title: Poster: Blockchain-Envisioned Secure Generic Communication Framework using Signcryption
papers.authors: Liang Zhang, Haibin Kan, Yuan Li, Jinrong Huang
papers.abstract: We aim at building a generic future-generation, secure communication framework on top of blockchain using signcryption. A publicly verifiable signcryption scheme not only ensures data confidentiality and authentication, but also enables messages to be verified or audited non-interactively. With blockchain as trustworthy computation and storage services, the proposed secure communication framework achieves tamper-resistance, non-repudiation, availability and public verification. Moreover, we consider both large-size data (e.g., file) and small-size data (e.g., cryptographic hash or key) transfer paradigms, where blockchain and signcryption schemes are seamlessly combined. In particular, IPFS is used as a hash oracle and decentralized storage platform in big data transfer.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们的目标是在区块链的基础上使用签密技术构建一个通用的下一代安全通信框架。可公开验证的签密方案不仅保证了数据的机密性和认证性，而且使得消息可以被非交互地验证或审计。利用区块链作为可信的计算和存储服务，提出的安全通信框架实现了防篡改、不可否认、可用性和公开验证。此外，我们考虑大尺寸数据(例如，文件)和小尺寸数据(例如，密码散列或密钥)传输范例，其中区块链和签密方案被无缝地结合。特别是，IPFS在大数据传输中被用作哈希oracle和分散存储平台。
papers.title_zh: 海报:区块链——使用签密的安全通用通信框架

papers.title: Poster: Toward Dynamic, Session-Preserving, Transition from Low to High Interaction Honeypots
papers.authors: Jaime C. Acosta
papers.abstract: Honeypots are technologies aimed at thwarting adversaries by instituting attractive services that are inconsequential to the legitimate objectives of a network. Low-interaction honeypots are lightweight, but provide a limited representation of real services, while high-interaction honeypots can mimic entire systems and services, but their computational costs are expensive, and are not always viable solutions, especially in constrained environments. This work is investigating the feasibility of being able to start with a low-interaction network service and then transitioning to a high-interaction service on-the-fly. During this transition, there should be no observable distinction from the perspective of a connecting client. This paper describes ongoing work that demonstrates a basic prototype with such a capability, specifically showing that a simple Netcat listener process can dynamically transition to a full NGINX server dynamically and without severing an active TCP session.
papers.abstract_zh: 蜜罐是一种技术，旨在通过建立对网络的合法目标无关紧要的有吸引力的服务来挫败对手。低交互蜜罐是轻量级的，但是提供真实服务的有限表示，而高交互蜜罐可以模拟整个系统和服务，但是它们的计算成本昂贵，并且不总是可行的解决方案，特别是在受限环境中。这项工作正在研究从低交互网络服务开始，然后动态过渡到高交互服务的可行性。在这个转换过程中，从连接客户端的角度来看，应该没有明显的区别。本文描述了正在进行的工作，演示了具有这种功能的基本原型，特别展示了一个简单的Netcat监听器进程可以动态地转换到一个完整的NGINX服务器，而不会中断一个活动的TCP会话。
papers.title_zh: 海报:走向动态、会话保持、从低到高交互蜜罐的转变

papers.title: Poster: ASQL - Attribute Based Access Control Extension for SQL
papers.authors: Proteet Paul, Tushar Gupta, Shamik Sural
papers.abstract: In recent years, several attempts have been made to address the challenges associated with the implementation of Attribute Based Access control (ABAC). However, almost all of these look at ABAC as an application-level access control model. In this paper, we show a direction towards supporting ABAC constructs in SQL for database-level access control. Required Structured Query Language (SQL) extensions are first proposed followed by a prototype implementation for MySQL, arguably the most popular open source relational database. Our initial experiments show encouraging results. The MySQL version with ASQL support is made freely available through our GitHub repository for any interested user to download and compile for generating the enhanced instance.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，已经进行了一些尝试来解决与基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)的实现相关联的挑战。然而，几乎所有这些都将ABAC视为应用级访问控制模型。在本文中，我们展示了一个在SQL中支持数据库级访问控制的ABAC结构的方向。首先提出了所需的结构化查询语言(SQL)扩展，然后是MySQL的原型实现，MySQL可以说是最流行的开源关系数据库。我们最初的实验显示了令人鼓舞的结果。支持ASQL的MySQL版本可以通过我们的GitHub资源库免费获得，任何感兴趣的用户都可以下载并编译以生成增强的实例。
papers.title_zh: 海报:ASQL——基于属性的SQL访问控制扩展

papers.title: Poster: A Flexible Relationship-Based Access Control Policy Generator
papers.authors: Stanley Clark, Nikolay Yakovets, George H. L. Fletcher, Nicola Zannone
papers.abstract: A plethora of Relationship-Based Access Control (ReBAC) models have been proposed, varying in the types of policies they can express. This fragmentation has stifled the creation of a benchmark to directly compare the performance of ReBAC systems based on their common supported policies. To solve this problem, we propose RACON, a schema-driven, customisable ReBAC policy generator. RACON generates policies in an intermediate language subsuming the features required to encode existing ReBAC models. This language can subsequently be translated to popular ReBAC policy languages through an extensible translation module. Taking a view of ReBAC policies as graph queries, we implement translations into two popular graph query languages, namely Cypher and SPARQL.
papers.abstract_zh: 已经提出了大量的基于关系的访问控制(ReBAC)模型，这些模型表达的策略类型各不相同。这种分割阻碍了基准的创建，无法直接比较基于共同支持策略的ReBAC系统的性能。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了RACON，一个模式驱动的、可定制的ReBAC策略生成器。RACON用一种中间语言生成策略，包含编码现有ReBAC模型所需的特性。该语言随后可以通过可扩展的翻译模块被翻译成流行的ReBAC策略语言。将ReBAC策略视为图查询，我们实现了到两种流行的图查询语言的翻译，即Cypher和SPARQL。
papers.title_zh: 海报:一个灵活的基于关系的访问控制策略生成器

papers.title: Poster: Toward Zero-Trust Path-Aware Access Control
papers.authors: Joshua H. Seaton, Sena Hounsinou, Timothy Wood, Shouhuai Xu, Philip N. Brown, Gedare Bloom
papers.abstract: In this poster, we introduce path-aware risk scores for access control (PARSAC), a novel context-sensitive technique to enrich access requests with risk scoring of the path taken by those requests between the authenticated user and the resources they access. These path-aware risk scores enable another layer of security for traditional access control systems that addresses the need for fine-grained monitoring and enforcement within a zero-trust architecture. We define rules for general functions that can be used to determine risk and instantiate a specific approach to calculate path risk scores. We evaluate our approach with realistic network graphs; PARSAC finds more paths with lower risk when compared with traditional routing algorithms that select the shortest path.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们介绍了路径感知的访问控制风险评分(PARSAC ),这是一种新颖的上下文敏感技术，通过对经过身份验证的用户和他们访问的资源之间的访问请求所采用的路径进行风险评分来丰富访问请求。这些路径感知风险分值为传统访问控制系统提供了另一层安全保护，满足了在零信任架构中进行细粒度监控和实施的需求。我们为可用于确定风险的一般函数定义了规则，并实例化了计算路径风险分数的特定方法。我们用现实的网络图来评估我们的方法；与选择最短路径的传统路由算法相比，PARSAC可以找到更多风险更低的路径。
papers.title_zh: 海报:走向零信任路径感知访问控制

papers.title: Demo: TLSAssistant v2: A Modular and Extensible Framework for Securing TLS
papers.authors: Matteo Rizzi, Salvatore Manfredi, Giada Sciarretta, Silvio Ranise
papers.abstract: To grasp the security implications of the various TLS configuration options, system administrators and app developers must be familiar with a wide range of concepts, including cryptography. To assist users in this task, we propose TLSAssistant- a modular and extensible framework designed to streamline the discovery and mitigation of potential vulnerabilities in TLS deployments. This demo will focus on two of the four available analysis types.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了掌握各种TLS配置选项的安全含义，系统管理员和应用程序开发人员必须熟悉广泛的概念，包括密码学。为了帮助用户完成这项任务，我们提出了TLS assistant——一个模块化和可扩展的框架，旨在简化TLS部署中潜在漏洞的发现和缓解。本演示将重点介绍四种可用分析类型中的两种。
papers.title_zh: 演示:TLSAssistant v2:保护TLS的模块化可扩展框架

papers.title: Machine Learning Integrity and Privacy in Adversarial Environments
papers.authors: Alina Oprea
papers.abstract: Machine learning is increasingly being used for automated decisions in applications such as health care, finance, autonomous vehicles, and personalized recommendations. These critical applications require strong guarantees on both the integrity of the machine learning models and the privacy of the user data used to train these models. The area of adversarial machine learning studies the effect of adversarial attacks against machine learning models and aims to design robust defense algorithms. The main challenges in this space are the development of realistic adversarial models that consider the specifics of real-world applications, and the design of machine learning algorithms resilient against a wide range of threats. In this talk, we describe our work on creating a taxonomy of poisoning attacks against machine learning systems at training time. In light of recent software supply chain vulnerabilities revealed by the SolarWinds attack, the supply chain of machine learning development needs to be protected. First, we introduce our optimization approach to create poisoning availability attacks against linear regression and discuss robust defenses based on techniques from robust statistics [1]. Then, we discuss how an attacker with minimal knowledge of a machine learning classifier can inject backdoor poisoning attacks, by leveraging techniques from machine learning explainability [4]. We demonstrate these methods on several malware classifiers and show the challenges of designing robust defenses to protect against these attacks. We also define a new attack model called subpopulation poisoning, that requires a small set of poisoning points to impact the accuracy of the model on a targeted subpopulation [2]. We evaluate our poisoning attacks on multiple data modalities, including image, text, and tabular data. Finally, we highlight a surprising connection between machine learning integrity and privacy attacks, and show how poisoning attacks can be used for auditing the privacy of machine learning algorithms such as differentially private stochastic gradient descent [3].
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习越来越多地用于医疗保健、金融、自动驾驶汽车和个性化推荐等应用中的自动化决策。这些关键应用需要对机器学习模型的完整性和用于训练这些模型的用户数据的隐私性进行强有力的保证。对抗性机器学习领域研究对抗性攻击对机器学习模型的影响，旨在设计鲁棒的防御算法。这一领域的主要挑战是开发考虑现实世界应用细节的现实对抗模型，以及设计能够抵御各种威胁的机器学习算法。在本次演讲中，我们描述了我们在训练时创建针对机器学习系统的中毒攻击分类的工作。鉴于最近网络安全管理软件产品攻击揭示的软件供应链漏洞，机器学习开发的供应链需要得到保护。首先，我们介绍了针对线性回归创建中毒可用性攻击的优化方法，并讨论了基于稳健统计技术的稳健防御[1]。然后，我们讨论了对机器学习分类器知之甚少的攻击者如何利用机器学习可解释性[4]中的技术来注入后门中毒攻击。我们在几个恶意软件分类器上演示了这些方法，并展示了设计强大的防御来抵御这些攻击的挑战。我们还定义了一种新的攻击模型，称为亚群中毒，它需要一小组中毒点来影响模型对目标亚群的准确性[2]。我们评估了对多种数据形态的中毒攻击，包括图像、文本和表格数据。最后，我们强调了机器学习完整性和隐私攻击之间令人惊讶的联系，并展示了中毒攻击如何用于审计机器学习算法的隐私，如差分私有随机梯度下降[3]。
papers.title_zh: 敌对环境中的机器学习完整性和隐私

papers.title: RMPlib: A Library of Benchmarks for the Role Mining Problem
papers.authors: Simon Anderer, Bernd Scheuermann, Sanaz Mostaghim, Patrick Bauerle, Matthias Beil
papers.abstract: Role Based Access Control is a widely spread concept in cyber security. Thus, the (NP-complete) Role Mining Problem (RMP), which consists of finding an optimal set of roles and a corresponding assignment of those roles to users, is of great scientific interest. Over the last years, different algorithms have been developed to search for good solutions to the RMP. However, conclusive benchmarks for thorough comparison of the developed methods are rarely known. This paper introduces to RMPlib, a library for the Role Mining Problem, containing a set of new industry-oriented benchmark instances partly taken from real-world use cases, partly created synthetically. Access to RMPlib is provided through a platform where researchers can actively contribute new benchmark instances and best solutions, such that the library adapts to the changing requirements in science. The current version of RMPlib can be found at https://github.com/RMPlib/RMPlib.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于角色的访问控制是网络安全中一个广泛传播的概念。因此,( NP-完全)角色挖掘问题(RMP)具有很大的科学意义，该问题包括找到一组最佳的角色并将这些角色分配给用户。在过去的几年里，不同的算法被开发出来寻找RMP的好的解决方案。然而，用于彻底比较已开发方法的决定性基准很少为人所知。本文向RMPlib介绍了一个用于角色挖掘问题的库，它包含一组新的面向行业的基准测试实例，这些实例部分来自真实世界的用例，部分是综合创建的。对RMPlib的访问是通过一个平台提供的，研究人员可以在这个平台上积极贡献新的基准实例和最佳解决方案，以便该库适应科学领域不断变化的要求。RMPlib的当前版本可在https://github.com/RMPlib/RMPlib.找到
papers.title_zh: RMPlib:角色挖掘问题的基准库

papers.title: Backdoor Attacks to Graph Neural Networks
papers.authors: Zaixi Zhang, Jinyuan Jia, Binghui Wang, Neil Zhenqiang Gong
papers.abstract: In this work, we propose the first backdoor attack to graph neural networks (GNN). Specifically, we propose a subgraph based backdoor attack to GNN for graph classification. In our backdoor attack, a GNN classifier predicts an attacker-chosen target label for a testing graph once a predefined subgraph is injected to the testing graph. Our empirical results on three real-world graph datasets show that our backdoor attacks are effective with a small impact on a GNN's prediction accuracy for clean testing graphs. Moreover, we generalize a randomized smoothing based certified defense to defend against our backdoor attacks. Our empirical results show that the defense is effective in some cases but ineffective in other cases, highlighting the needs of new defenses for our backdoor attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，我们提出了第一个后门攻击图神经网络(GNN)。具体来说，我们提出了一个基于子图的后门攻击GNN图分类。在我们的后门攻击中，一旦预定义的子图被注入到测试图中，GNN分类器预测攻击者为测试图选择的目标标签。我们在三个真实世界图数据集上的实验结果表明，我们的后门攻击是有效的，并且对干净测试图的GNN预测精度影响很小。此外，我们还推广了一种基于随机平滑的认证防御方法来抵御我们的后门攻击。我们的实证结果表明，防御在某些情况下是有效的，但在其他情况下是无效的，这突出了我们对后门攻击的新防御的需求。
papers.title_zh: 图神经网络的后门攻击

papers.title: Analyzing the Usefulness of the DARPA OpTC Dataset in Cyber Threat Detection Research
papers.authors: Md. Monowar Anjum, Shahrear Iqbal, Benoit Hamelin
papers.abstract: Maintaining security and privacy in real-world enterprise networks is becoming more and more challenging. Cyber actors are increasingly employing previously unreported and state-of-the-art techniques to break into corporate networks. To develop novel and effective methods to thwart these sophisticated cyber attacks, we need datasets that reflect real-world enterprise scenarios to a high degree of accuracy. However, precious few such datasets are publicly available. Researchers still predominantly use the decade-old KDD datasets, however, studies showed that these datasets do not adequately reflect modern attacks like Advanced Persistent Threats (APT). In this work, we analyze the usefulness of the recently introduced DARPA Operationally Transparent Cyber (OpTC) dataset in this regard. We describe the content of the dataset in detail and present a qualitative analysis. We show that the OpTC dataset is an excellent candidate for advanced cyber threat detection research while also highlighting its limitations. Additionally, we propose several research directions where this dataset can be useful.
papers.abstract_zh: 在现实世界的企业网络中维护安全性和隐私正变得越来越具有挑战性。网络参与者越来越多地使用以前未报道过的最先进的技术侵入企业网络。为了开发新的有效方法来挫败这些复杂的网络攻击，我们需要高度准确地反映真实世界企业场景的数据集。然而，很少有这样的数据集是公开的。研究人员仍然主要使用十年前的KDD数据集，但是，研究表明，这些数据集不能充分反映现代攻击，如高级持续威胁(APT)。在这项工作中，我们分析了最近推出的DARPA操作透明网络(OpTC)数据集在这方面的有用性。我们详细描述了数据集的内容，并进行定性分析。我们表明OpTC数据集是高级网络威胁检测研究的优秀候选对象，同时也强调了它的局限性。此外，我们提出了几个研究方向，这个数据集可以是有用的。
papers.title_zh: 分析DARPA OpTC数据集在网络威胁探测研究中的有用性

papers.title: Towards a Theory for Semantics and Expressiveness Analysis of Rule-Based Access Control Models
papers.authors: Amirreza Masoumzadeh, Paliath Narendran, Padmavathi Iyer
papers.abstract: Recent access control models such as attribute-based access control and relationship-based access control allow flexible expression of authorization policies using the concepts of rules and conditional expressions. The independent nature of policy rules from each other and the amount of flexibility that they enjoy (e.g., the type of conditional expressions they support and whether they can permit or deny matching requests) make those policies quite expressive. But how expressive are they? Do we need to enable all possible flexibilities in a rule-based model to achieve the maximum possible expressiveness? Answering such questions is essential in making informed decisions when designing new models or choosing existing models for implementation. In this paper, we propose an approach towards answering those questions by developing a novel theory for capturing the semantics of rule-based policies depending on their support of different constructs such as flexibility of conditional expressions, rule modalities, and conflict resolution. Our formal policy semantics model enjoys an intuitive design that can capture the semantics of various rule-based policies. We show the well-formedness properties of such semantics and how they can be used to analyze the expressive power of a number of rule-based models.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的访问控制模型，如基于属性的访问控制和基于关系的访问控制，允许使用规则和条件表达式的概念灵活地表达授权策略。策略规则相互之间的独立性以及它们所享有的灵活性(例如，它们支持的条件表达式的类型以及它们是否可以允许或拒绝匹配请求)使得这些策略非常有表现力。但是它们的表现力如何呢？我们是否需要在基于规则的模型中启用所有可能的灵活性，以实现最大可能的表达能力？在设计新模型或选择现有模型进行实施时，回答这些问题对于做出明智的决策至关重要。在本文中，我们提出了一种方法来回答这些问题，通过开发一种新的理论来捕获基于规则的策略的语义，这些策略依赖于它们对不同结构的支持，如条件表达式的灵活性、规则模态和冲突解决。我们的正式策略语义模型具有直观的设计，可以捕获各种基于规则的策略的语义。我们展示了这种语义的良构特性，以及它们如何被用来分析许多基于规则的模型的表达能力。
papers.title_zh: 基于规则的访问控制模型的语义和表达分析理论

papers.title: Towards Unifying RBAC with Information Flow Control
papers.authors: B. S. Radhika, N. V. Narendra Kumar, R. K. Shyamasundar
papers.abstract: Role-based Access Control (RBAC) is one of the most widely implemented access control models. In today's complex computing systems, one of the increasingly sought-after features for reliable security is information flow control. Although RBAC is a policy-neutral and generic model, its implementations generally do not provide information flow control. In this paper, we present two approaches to address this issue. In the first method, we describe how a lattice model can be captured using an RBAC configuration. In the second method, we analyze the information flows in a given RBAC policy using a decentralized lattice model called Readers-Writers Flow Model. This method identifies the indirect information flows in the policy and helps in creating flow-secure RBAC policies. We discuss the scope and limitations of these methods in detail and also present a brief case study. Finally, we investigate the use of flow-secure RBAC policies in creating flow-secure Attribute-based Access Control (ABAC) policies.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于角色的访问控制(RBAC)是应用最广泛的访问控制模型之一。在当今复杂的计算系统中，越来越受欢迎的可靠安全特性之一是信息流控制。尽管RBAC是一个策略中立的通用模型，但它的实现通常不提供信息流控制。在本文中，我们提出了两种方法来解决这个问题。在第一种方法中，我们描述了如何使用RBAC配置捕获晶格模型。在第二种方法中，我们使用称为读者-作者流模型的分散网格模型来分析给定RBAC策略中的信息流。该方法识别策略中的间接信息流，并帮助创建流安全RBAC策略。我们详细讨论了这些方法的范围和局限性，并给出了一个简单的案例研究。最后，我们研究了流安全RBAC策略在创建流安全的基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)策略中的应用。
papers.title_zh: 将RBAC与信息流控制统一起来

papers.title: Poster: Towards Cloud-Based Software for Incorporating Time and Location into Access Control Decisions
papers.authors: Mustafa Al-Lail
papers.abstract: The increasing dependency on cloud computing has drawn attention to the security weaknesses of cloud providers. Not only how information is accessed, but also where and when have become important considerations in cloud security. Certain situations exist where it is necessary to restrict access to cloud resources based on time and location. An example is a policy for a medical institution where doctors can only access patient records at hospitals during their shifts. The Generalized Spatio-Temporal Role-Based Access Control model (GSTRBAC) determines users’ access to resources based on such information. This poster proposes a cloud-based software architecture and outlines it possible implementation of the GSTRBAC model.
papers.abstract_zh: 对云计算日益增长的依赖引起了人们对云提供商安全弱点的关注。不仅是如何访问信息，何时何地访问信息也成为云安全的重要考虑因素。在某些情况下，有必要根据时间和位置限制对云资源的访问。一个例子是一个医疗机构的政策，其中医生只能在他们轮班期间访问医院的患者记录。基于角色的广义时空访问控制模型(GSTRBAC)基于这些信息确定用户对资源的访问。这篇文章提出了一个基于云的软件架构，并概述了GSTRBAC模型的可能实现。
papers.title_zh: 海报:走向将时间和位置纳入访问控制决策的基于云的软件

papers.title: In-Memory Policy Indexing for Policy Retrieval Points in Attribute-Based Access Control
papers.authors: Dominic Heutelbeck, Marc Lucas Baur, Martin Kluba
papers.abstract: Attribute-Based Access Control (ABAC) systems are using machine-readable rules for making access control decisions. Rules are collected in documents, the named policies, or policy sets. These are expressed in a specific policy language, such as XACML, ALFA, or SAPL. Within systems implementing the ABAC reference architecture, policy documents are persisted in a Policy Retrieval Point (PRP). This paper addresses the problem of efficiently retrieving policy documents applicable to a given authorization request (or subscription) from the PRP. Applicability is determined by a specific section of the document, commonly named target expression. The target expression consists of matching conditions, more precisely Boolean expressions based on request (or subscription) data. This paper presents a novel in-memory data structure that is used to index policy documents. The index allows retrieving documents matching a given authorization request more efficiently from a large set of policies. The empirical evaluation demonstrates, that the proposed algorithm can reduce policy retrieval time in PRPs by up to 98%, depending on the structure of the policies.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)系统使用机器可读的规则来做出访问控制决策。规则收集在文档、命名策略或策略集中。这些用特定的策略语言来表达，比如XACML、ALFA或SAPL。在实现ABAC参考架构的系统中，策略文档保存在策略检索点(PRP)。本文解决了从PRP中有效地检索适用于给定授权请求(或订阅)的策略文档的问题。适用性由文档的特定部分决定，通常称为目标表达式。目标表达式由匹配条件组成，更准确地说是基于请求(或订阅)数据的布尔表达式。本文提出了一种新的用于索引策略文档的内存数据结构。该索引允许从大量策略中更有效地检索与给定授权请求匹配的文档。实验评估表明，根据策略的结构，所提出的算法可以将PRPs中的策略检索时间减少高达98%。
papers.title_zh: 基于属性的访问控制中策略检索点的内存策略索引

papers.title: Mutation Analysis of NGAC Policies
papers.authors: Erzhuo Chen, Vladislav Dubrovenski, Dianxiang Xu
papers.abstract: The NGAC (Next Generation Access Control) standard for attribute-based access control (ABAC) allows for run-time changes of the permission and prohibition configurations through administrative obligations triggered by access events. It makes access control more fine-grained and dynamic. However, it raises challenges for assuring the correctness of NGAC policies. As policy testing is an important technique for quality assurance, this paper presents an approach to mutation analysis of NGAC policies. It can evaluate the effectiveness of a testing method and reveal potential faults in an inadequately tested policy. The mutation analysis covers various types of potential faults in the assignments, associations, prohibitions, and obligations of NGAC policies. This paper also proposes an incremental testing approach that first validates the initial configuration of a policy and then the policy as a whole. It helps determine whether faults appear in the configuration or the obligations. To evaluate the work, we have developed four working policies and their test suites based on the current NGAC reference implementation. The empirical studies show that the mutation analysis can shed light on the strengths and weaknesses of the test suites. They also demonstrate the need for developing more cost-effective testing methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)的NGAC(下一代访问控制)标准允许通过由访问事件触发的管理义务在运行时改变许可和禁止配置。它使得访问控制更加细粒度和动态。然而，它对确保NGAC政策的正确性提出了挑战。由于策略测试是质量保证的重要技术，本文提出了一种NGAC策略突变分析的方法。它可以评估测试方法的有效性，并揭示未经充分测试的策略中的潜在错误。突变分析涵盖了NGAC政策的分配、关联、禁止和义务中的各种类型的潜在错误。本文还提出了一种增量测试方法，首先验证策略的初始配置，然后验证整个策略。它有助于确定故障是否出现在配置或义务中。为了评估这项工作，我们基于当前的NGAC参考实现开发了四个工作策略及其测试套件。实证研究表明，突变分析可以揭示测试套件的优势和劣势。它们还表明需要开发更具成本效益的测试方法。
papers.title_zh: NGAC政策的突变分析

papers.title: Valued Authorization Policy Existence Problem
papers.authors: Jason Crampton, Eduard Eiben, Gregory Z. Gutin, Daniel Karapetyan, Diptapriyo Majumdar
papers.abstract: Problems of satisfiability and resiliency in workflows have been widely studied in the last decade. Recent work has shown that many such problems may be viewed as special cases of the authorization policy existence problem (APEP), which returns an authorization policy if one exists and "No'' otherwise. A solution may not exist because of the restrictions imposed by the base authorization relation and constraints that form part of the input to APEP. However, in many practical settings it would be more useful to obtain a "least bad" policy than just a "No", where "least bad'' is characterized by some numerical value associated with the policy indicating the extent to which the policy violates the base authorization relation and constraints. Accordingly, we introduce the Valued APEP, which returns an authorization policy of minimum weight, where the (non-negative) weight is determined by the constraints violated by the returned solution (and is 0 if all constraints are satisfied). We then establish a number of results concerning the parameterized complexity of Valued APEP. We prove that the problem is fixed-parameter tractable if the set of constraints satisfies two restrictions, but is intractable if only one of these restrictions holds. (Most constraints known to be of practical use satisfy these restrictions.) We introduce the notion of a user profile for a weighted constraint, which enables us to prove a powerful result, a corollary of which improves on known complexity results for APEP. Finally, we consider Valued APEP when restricted to particular sub-classes of constraints and show that instances of such problems can be reduced to the valued workflow satisfiability problem, enabling us to exploit known algorithms to solve these particular instances.
papers.abstract_zh: 工作流中的可满足性和弹性问题在过去十年中得到了广泛的研究。最近的工作表明，许多这样的问题可以被视为授权策略存在问题(APEP)的特殊情况，如果存在授权策略，则返回授权策略，否则返回“否”。解决方案可能不存在，因为基础授权关系和约束所施加的限制构成了对APEP的输入的一部分。然而，在许多实际设置中，获得“最不坏”策略比仅仅“不”更有用，其中“最不坏”由与该策略相关联的某个数值来表征，该数值指示该策略违反基本授权关系和约束的程度。因此，我们引入有值APEP，它返回最小权重的授权策略，其中(非负)权重由返回的解决方案违反的约束确定(如果所有约束都满足，则为0)。然后我们建立了一些关于值APEP的参数化复杂性的结果。我们证明了如果约束集满足两个约束，问题是固定参数可处理的，但是如果只有一个约束成立，问题是不可处理的。(大多数已知的实用约束满足这些限制。)我们引入加权约束的用户简档的概念，这使我们能够证明一个强有力的结果，其推论改进了已知的APEP复杂性结果。最后，我们考虑了当被限制到特定的约束子类时的有值APEP，并且表明这种问题的实例可以被简化为有值工作流可满足性问题，使得我们能够利用已知的算法来解决这些特定的实例。
papers.title_zh: 有值授权策略存在问题

papers.title: Demo: Attribute-Stream-Based Access Control (ASBAC) with the Streaming Attribute Policy Language (SAPL)
papers.authors: Dominic Heutelbeck
papers.abstract: Traditional Attribute-Based Access Control (ABAC) implementations are based on a request-response protocol resulting in one decision for one authorization request. In stateful, session-based applications this may lead to polling the policy decision point (PDP) and policy information points (PIPs) referenced by policies. This leads to the well-known trade-offs between polling frequency and latency of updates becoming known to the client. Attribute-Stream-based Access Control (ASBAC) is an authorization model employing a publish-subscribe pattern protocol where a single subscription results in a stream of decisions dynamically updating based on the streams of changing attribute values, streams of changing policies, and PDP configuration. This demonstration will show the basic architecture of ASBAC based systems, show how the model is implemented by the Streaming Attribute Policy Language (SAPL) and its engine. The SAPL engine is available as Open Source for security researchers and practitioners.
