Such platforms often expose programming interfaces for developing automation apps that mechanize different tasks among smart sensors and actuators (e.g., automatically turning on the AC when the room temperature is above 80 F). Due to the lack of effective access control mechanisms, these automation apps can not only have unrestricted access to the user's sensitive information (e.g., the user is not at home) but also violate user expectations by performing undesired actions. As users often obtain these apps from unvetted sources, a malicious app can wreak havoc on a smart-home system by either violating the user's security and privacy, or creating safety hazards (e.g., turning on the oven when no one is at home). To mitigate such threats, we propose Expat which ensures that user expectations are never violated by the installed automation apps at runtime. To achieve this goal, Expat provides a platform-agnostic, formal specification language UEI for capturing user expectations of the installed automation apps' behavior. For effective authoring of these expectations (as policies) in UEI, Expat also allows a user to check the desired properties (e.g., consistency, entailment) of them; which due to their formal semantics can be easily discharged by an SMT solver. Expat then enforces UEI policies in situ with an inline reference monitor which can be realized using the same app programming interface exposed by the underlying platform. We instantiate Expat for one of the representative platforms, OpenHAB, and demonstrate it can effectively mitigate a wide array of threats by enforcing user expectations while incurring only modest performance overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文致力于开发一种面向应用智能家居平台的安全机制。这些平台通常会提供编程接口，用于开发自动化应用程序，在智能传感器和执行器之间实现不同的任务(例如，当室温高于80华氏度时，自动打开空调)。由于缺乏有效的访问控制机制，这些自动化应用不仅可以不受限制地访问用户的敏感信息(例如，用户不在家)，还可以通过执行不期望的操作来违背用户的期望。由于用户经常从未经验证的来源获得这些应用程序，恶意应用程序可能会通过侵犯用户的安全和隐私，或者制造安全隐患(例如，当没人在家时打开烤箱)来破坏智能家居系统。为了减轻这种威胁，我们提出Expat，它可以确保运行时安装的自动化应用程序不会违反用户的期望。为了实现这一目标，Expat提供了一种平台无关的正式规范语言UEI，用于捕捉用户对已安装自动化应用行为的预期。为了在UEI有效地创作这些期望(作为策略)，Expat还允许用户检查它们的期望属性(例如，一致性、包含性)；由于它们的形式语义，SMT求解器可以很容易地处理它们。然后，Expat使用内嵌引用监视器就地执行UEI策略，这可以使用底层平台公开的相同应用程序编程接口来实现。我们针对其中一个代表性平台OpenHAB实例化了Expat，并展示了它可以通过加强用户期望来有效地缓解各种威胁，同时只产生适度的性能开销。
papers.title_zh: Expat:基于预期的应用智能家居平台政策分析与实施

papers.title: Owner-Centric Sharing of Physical Resources, Data, and Data-Driven Insights in Digital Ecosystems
papers.authors: Kwok Cheung, Michael Huth, Laurence Kirk, Leif-Nissen Lundbæk, Rodolphe Marques, Jan Petsche
papers.abstract: We are living in an age in which digitization will connect more and more physical assets with IT systems and where IoT endpoints will generate a wealth of valuable data. Companies, individual users, and organizations alike therefore have the need to control their own physical or non-physical assets and data sources. At the same time, they recognize the need for, and opportunity to, share access to such data and digitized physical assets. This paper sets out our technology vision for such sharing ecosystems, reports initial work in that direction, identifies challenges for realizing this vision, and seeks feedback and collaboration from the academic access-control community in that R&D space.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们生活在一个数字化将越来越多的物理资产与IT系统连接起来的时代，物联网终端将产生大量有价值的数据。因此，公司、个人用户和组织等都需要控制他们自己的物理或非物理资产和数据源。与此同时，他们认识到共享这些数据和数字化有形资产的需要和机会。本文阐述了我们对这种共享生态系统的技术愿景，报告了在这一方向的初步工作，确定了实现这一愿景的挑战，并寻求R&D空间中学术访问控制社区的反馈和合作。
papers.title_zh: 在数字生态系统中以所有者为中心共享物理资源、数据和数据驱动的洞察

papers.title: IoT Passport: A Blockchain-Based Trust Framework for Collaborative Internet-of-Things
papers.authors: Bo Tang, Hongjuan Kang, Jingwen Fan, Qi Li, Ravi S. Sandhu
papers.abstract: Internet-of-Things (IoT) is a rapidly-growing transformative expansion of the Internet with increasing influence on our daily life. Since the number of "things" is expected to soon surpass human population, control and automation of IoT devices has received considerable attention from academia and industry. Cross-platform collaboration is highly desirable for better user experience due to fragmentation of user needs and vendor products with time. Centralized approaches have been used to build federated trust among platforms and devices, but limit diversity and scalability. We propose a decentralized trust framework, called IoT Passport, for cross-platform collaborations using blockchain technology. IoT Passport is motivated by the familiar use of passports for international travel but with greater dynamism. It enables platforms to establish arbitrary trust relations with each other containing specific rules for intended collaborations, enforced by a combination of smart contracts. Each interaction among devices is signed by the participants and recorded on the blockchain. The records are utilized as attributes for authorization and as proofs of incentive plans. This approach incorporates the preferences of participating platforms and end users, and opens new avenues for collaborative edge computing as well as research on blockchain-based access control mechanism for IoT environments.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)是互联网的一个快速发展的变革性扩展，对我们的日常生活影响越来越大。由于“物”的数量预计将很快超过人类人口，物联网设备的控制和自动化受到了学术界和工业界的广泛关注。由于用户需求和厂商产品随时间的分散，跨平台协作对于更好的用户体验是非常可取的。集中式方法已经被用于在平台和设备之间建立联合信任，但是限制了多样性和可扩展性。我们提出了一个分散的信任框架，称为物联网护照，用于使用区块链技术的跨平台协作。物联网护照的动机是人们熟悉的国际旅行使用护照，但有更大的动力。它使平台能够在彼此之间建立任意的信任关系，包含特定的合作规则，并通过智能契约的组合来实施。设备之间的每次交互都由参与者签名并记录在区块链上。这些记录被用作授权的属性和激励计划的证据。这种方法结合了参与平台和终端用户的偏好，为协作边缘计算以及基于区块链的物联网环境访问控制机制的研究开辟了新的途径。
papers.title_zh: 物联网通行证:基于区块链的协作物联网信任框架

papers.title: An OpenRBAC Semantic Model for Access Control in Vehicular Networks
papers.authors: Sultan Alsarra, I-Ling Yen, Yongtao Huang, Farokh B. Bastani, Bhavani Thuraisingham
papers.abstract: Inter-vehicle communication has the potential to significantly improve driving safety, but also raises security concerns. The fundamental mechanism to govern information sharing behaviors is access control. Since vehicular networks have a highly dynamic and open nature, access control becomes very challenging. Existing works are not applicable to the vehicular world. In this paper, we develop a new access control model, openRBAC, and the corresponding mechanisms for access control in vehicular systems. Our approach lets the accessee define a relative role hierarchy, specifying all potential accessor roles in terms of their relative perception to the accessees. Access control policies are defined for the relative roles in the hierarchy. Since the accessee has a clear understanding of the relative roles defined by itself, the policy definitions can be precise and less flawed.
papers.abstract_zh: 车辆间通信具有显著提高驾驶安全性的潜力，但也引起了安全问题。管理信息共享行为的基本机制是访问控制。由于车载网络具有高度动态性和开放性，访问控制变得非常具有挑战性。现有作品不适用于车辆世界。本文提出了一种新的访问控制模型openRBAC，以及相应的车载系统访问控制机制。我们的方法让被访问者定义一个相对的角色层次，根据他们对被访问者的相对感知来指定所有潜在的访问者角色。访问控制策略是为层次结构中的相对角色定义的。由于被访问方对自己定义的相对角色有清楚的理解，所以策略定义可以是精确的且较少有缺陷。
papers.title_zh: 车载网络访问控制的OpenRBAC语义模型

papers.title: Toward Detection of Access Control Models from Source Code via Word Embedding
papers.authors: John Heaps, Xiaoyin Wang, Travis D. Breaux, Jianwei Niu
papers.abstract: Advancement in machine learning techniques in recent years has led to deep learning applications on source code. While there is little research available on the subject, the work that has been done shows great potential. We believe deep learning can be leveraged to obtain new insight into automated access control policy verification. In this paper, we describe our first step in applying learning techniques to access control, which consists of developing word embeddings to bootstrap learning tasks. We also discuss the future work on identifying access control enforcement code and checking access control policy violations, which can be enabled by word embeddings.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来机器学习技术的进步导致了对源代码的深度学习应用。虽然关于这个主题的研究很少，但已经完成的工作显示了巨大的潜力。我们相信可以利用深度学习来获得对自动化访问控制策略验证的新见解。在本文中，我们描述了将学习技术应用于访问控制的第一步，包括开发单词嵌入来引导学习任务。我们还讨论了识别访问控制执行代码和检查访问控制策略违反的未来工作，这可以通过单词嵌入来实现。
papers.title_zh: 通过单词嵌入从源代码中检测访问控制模型

papers.title: On the Difficulty of Using Patient's Physiological Signals in Cryptographic Protocols
papers.authors: Eduard Marin, Enrique Argones-Rúa, Dave Singelée, Bart Preneel
papers.abstract: With the increasing capabilities of wearable sensors and implantable medical devices, new opportunities arise to diagnose, control and treat several chronic conditions. Unfortunately, these advancements also open new attack vectors, making security an essential requirement for the further adoption of these devices. Researchers have already developed security solutions tailored to their unique requirements and constraints. However, a fundamental yet unsolved problem is how to securely and efficiently establish and manage cryptographic keys. One of the most promising approaches is the use of patient's physiological signals for key establishment. This paper aims at identifying common pitfalls in physiological-signal-based cryptographic protocols. These solutions are very fragile because errors can be introduced at different stages, including the choice of the physiological signal, the design of the protocol or its implementation. We start by reviewing previous work that has succeeded in measuring various physiological signals remotely. Subsequently, we conduct a thorough security analysis of two cryptographic solutions well-accepted by the security community, namely the H2H protocol (Rostami et al. - CCS 2013) and the Biosec protocol (Cherukuri et al. - ICISIP 2006). Our evaluation reveals that these protocols have serious design and implementation security weaknesses. Driven by our findings, we then describe how to use fuzzy extractors for designing secure and efficient cryptographic solutions based on the patients' physiological signals. Finally, we discuss research directions for future work.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着可穿戴传感器和植入式医疗设备功能的不断增强，诊断、控制和治疗多种慢性疾病的新机会出现了。不幸的是，这些进步也开启了新的攻击媒介，使得安全性成为进一步采用这些设备的基本要求。研究人员已经开发出适合他们独特需求和限制的安全解决方案。然而，一个尚未解决的基本问题是如何安全有效地建立和管理密钥。最有希望的方法之一是使用患者的生理信号来建立密钥。本文旨在识别基于生理信号的密码协议中的常见陷阱。这些解决方案非常脆弱，因为误差可能在不同阶段引入，包括生理信号的选择、协议的设计或其实施。我们首先回顾以前成功远程测量各种生理信号的工作。随后，我们对安全社区广泛接受的两种加密解决方案进行了彻底的安全性分析，即H2H协议(Rostami等人- CCS 2013)和Biosec协议(Cherukuri等人- ICISIP 2006)。我们的评估表明，这些协议在设计和实现方面存在严重的安全缺陷。在我们的发现的驱动下，我们描述了如何使用模糊提取器来设计基于患者生理信号的安全有效的加密解决方案。最后，我们讨论了未来工作的研究方向。
papers.title_zh: 在密码协议中使用病人生理信号的困难

papers.title: HITC: Data Privacy in Online Social Networks with Fine-Grained Access Control
papers.authors: Ahmed Khalil Abdulla, Spiridon Bakiras
papers.abstract: Online Social Networks (OSNs), such as Facebook and Twitter, are popular platforms that enable users to interact and socialize through their networked devices. The social nature of such applications encourages users to share a great amount of personal data with other users and the OSN service providers, including pictures, personal views, location check-ins, etc. Nevertheless, recent data leaks on major online platforms demonstrate the ineffectiveness of the access control mechanisms that are implemented by the service providers, and has led to an increased demand for provably secure privacy controls. To this end, we introduce Hide In The Crowd (HITC), a flexible system that leverages encryption-based access control, where users can assign arbitrary decryption privileges to every data object that is posted on the OSN platforms. The decryption privileges can be assigned on the finest granularity level, for example, to a hand-picked group of users. HITC is designed as a browser extension and can be integrated to any existing OSN platform without the need for a third-party server. We describe our prototype implementation of HITC over Twitter and evaluate its performance and scalability.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线社交网络(osn)，如脸书和Twitter，是用户通过网络设备进行互动和社交的流行平台。这种应用的社交性质鼓励用户与其他用户和OSN服务提供商共享大量个人数据，包括图片、个人视图、位置签到等。然而，最近主要在线平台上的数据泄露表明服务提供商实施的访问控制机制无效，并导致对可证明安全的隐私控制的需求增加。为此，我们引入了隐藏在人群中(HITC)，这是一个灵活的系统，利用基于加密的访问控制，用户可以为OSN平台上发布的每个数据对象分配任意的解密权限。例如，解密特权可以在最精细的粒度级别上分配给精选的一组用户。HITC被设计为一个浏览器扩展，可以集成到任何现有的OSN平台，而不需要第三方服务器。我们描述了Twitter上HITC的原型实现，并评估了它的性能和可伸缩性。
papers.title_zh: HITC:具有细粒度访问控制的在线社交网络中的数据隐私

papers.title: Generalized Mining of Relationship-Based Access Control Policies in Evolving Systems
papers.authors: Padmavathi Iyer, Amirreza Masoumzadeh
papers.abstract: Relationship-based access control (ReBAC) provides a flexible approach to specify policies based on relationships between system entities, which makes them a natural fit for many modern information systems, beyond online social networks. In this paper we are concerned with the problem of mining ReBAC policies from lower-level authorization information. Mining ReBAC policies can address transforming access control paradigms to ReBAC, reformulating existing ReBAC policies as more information becomes available, as well as inferring potentially unknown policies. Particularly, we propose a systematic algorithm for mining ReBAC authorization policies, and a first of its kind approach to mine graph transition policies that govern the evolution of ReBAC systems. Experimental evaluation manifests efficiency of the proposed approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于关系的访问控制(ReBAC)提供了一种灵活的方法来根据系统实体之间的关系指定策略，这使得它们非常适合许多现代信息系统，而不仅仅是在线社交网络。在本文中，我们关注的问题是挖掘ReBAC政策从较低层次的授权信息。挖掘ReBAC策略可以解决将访问控制范例转换为ReBAC，随着更多信息变得可用而重新制定现有的ReBAC策略，以及推断潜在的未知策略。特别地，我们提出了一个挖掘ReBAC授权策略的系统算法，并首次提出了一种挖掘控制ReBAC系统演化的图转换策略的方法。实验评估表明了所提方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 进化系统中基于关系的访问控制策略的广义挖掘

papers.title: Enhancing Biometric-Capsule-based Authentication and Facial Recognition via Deep Learning
papers.authors: Tyler Phillips, Xukai Zou, Feng Li, Ninghui Li
papers.abstract: In recent years, developers have used the proliferation of biometric sensors in smart devices, along with recent advances in deep learning, to implement an array of biometrics-based authentication systems. Though these systems demonstrate remarkable performance and have seen wide acceptance, they present unique and pressing security and privacy concerns. One proposed method which addresses these concerns is the elegant, fusion-based BioCapsule method. The BioCapsule method is provably secure, privacy-preserving, cancellable and flexible in its secure feature fusion design. In this work, we extend BioCapsule to face-based recognition. Moreover, we incorporate state-of-art deep learning techniques into a BioCapsule-based facial authentication system to further enhance secure recognition accuracy. We compare the performance of an underlying recognition system to the performance of the BioCapsule-embedded system in order to demonstrate the minimal effects of the BioCapsule scheme on underlying system performance. We also demonstrate that the BioCapsule scheme outperforms or performs as well as many other proposed secure biometric techniques.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，开发人员利用智能设备中生物识别传感器的激增，以及深度学习的最新进展，实现了一系列基于生物识别的身份认证系统。尽管这些系统表现出卓越的性能并被广泛接受，但它们存在独特而紧迫的安全和隐私问题。提出的一种解决这些问题的方法是优雅的基于融合的生物胶囊方法。生物胶囊方法在其安全特征融合设计中是可证明安全的、隐私保护的、可取消的和灵活的。在这项工作中，我们将BioCapsule扩展到基于人脸的识别。此外，我们将最先进的深度学习技术融入到基于生物胶囊的面部认证系统中，以进一步提高安全识别的准确性。我们将底层识别系统的性能与嵌入生物胶囊的系统的性能进行比较，以展示生物胶囊方案对底层系统性能的最小影响。我们还证明了生物胶囊方案优于或表现得和许多其他提出的安全生物识别技术一样好。
papers.title_zh: 通过深度学习增强基于生物特征胶囊的认证和面部识别

papers.title: History and Future of Automated Vulnerability Analysis
papers.authors: Adam Doupé
papers.abstract: The software upon which our modern society operates is riddled with security vulnerabilities. These vulnerabilities allow hackers access to our sensitive data and make our system insecure. To identify vulnerabilities in software, human experts, or vulnerability researchers, are employed. These human experts are quite expensive. And, more fundamentally, human experts cannot analyze every change made to every piece of software (any of which could introduce a security vulnerability). Therefore, automated vulnerability analysis techniques were developed to automatically perform the process of identifying security vulnerabilities in software systems. These tools attempt to democratize the vulnerability analysis process: allowing any developer to identify vulnerabilities in their software automatically, thus finding such vulnerabilities before a malicious hacker. In this keynote, I will discuss the history of automated vulnerability analysis, from both the binary and the web perspective. Binary fuzzing and black-box web application vulnerability analysis have many aspects in common, yet are often thought of separately. From this, I will discuss the future of automated vulnerability analysis, and how we can achieve the effectiveness of a human vulnerability researcher.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代社会赖以运行的软件充满了安全漏洞。这些漏洞允许黑客访问我们的敏感数据，使我们的系统不安全。为了识别软件中的漏洞，雇佣了人类专家或漏洞研究人员。这些人类专家相当昂贵。而且，更根本的是，人类专家无法分析对每一个软件所做的每一个更改(任何一个都可能引入安全漏洞)。因此，开发了自动漏洞分析技术来自动执行识别软件系统中的安全漏洞的过程。这些工具试图使漏洞分析过程民主化:允许任何开发人员自动识别他们软件中的漏洞，从而在恶意黑客之前发现这些漏洞。在这个主题演讲中，我将从二进制和web的角度讨论自动化漏洞分析的历史。二进制模糊化和黑盒web应用程序漏洞分析有许多共同的方面，但通常被认为是分开的。由此，我将讨论自动化漏洞分析的未来，以及我们如何实现人类漏洞研究者的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 自动化漏洞分析的历史和未来

papers.title: Towards Effective Verification of Multi-Model Access Control Properties
papers.authors: Bernhard J. Berger, Christian Maeder, Rodrigue Wete Nguempnang, Karsten Sohr, Carlos E. Rubio-Medrano
papers.abstract: Many existing software systems like logistics systems or enterprise applications employ data security in a more or less ad hoc fashion. Our approach focuses on access control such as permission-based discretionary access control (DAC), variants of role-based access control (RBAC) with delegation, and attribute-based access control (ABAC). Typically, software systems implement hybrid access control making an effective security analysis and assessment rather difficult. We propose an analysis methodology to reconstruct access control using a novel modular access control model. Our modular approach allows us to flexibly model exactly those access properties that are relevant for a given system. As formalism we use the Object Constraint Language (OCL) with Ecore from the Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF). We demonstrate the suitability of our access control model for three software systems: a port community system (PCS), a clinical information system (CIS), and an identity management system (IdMS). For the PCS and CIS we model concrete roles and policies. For the IdMS we evaluate our analysis methodology in-depth by reconstructing access control policies from byte code using the Soot analysis framework as well as model transformation techniques (QVTo). The resulting model helped us to identify design deficiencies. Violated OCL invariants such as for mutually exclusive roles or cardinality constraints revealed non-trivial security vulnerabilities.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多现有的软件系统，如物流系统或企业应用程序，或多或少以特定的方式使用数据安全性。我们的方法侧重于访问控制，如基于权限的自主访问控制(DAC)，基于角色的授权访问控制(RBAC)和基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)。通常，软件系统实现混合访问控制，使得有效的安全分析和评估相当困难。我们提出了一种分析方法，使用一种新的模块化访问控制模型来重构访问控制。我们的模块化方法允许我们灵活地精确建模那些与给定系统相关的访问属性。作为形式主义，我们使用对象约束语言(OCL)和Eclipse建模框架(EMF)的Ecore。我们展示了我们的访问控制模型对三个软件系统的适用性:港口社区系统(PCS)、临床信息系统(CIS)和身份管理系统(IdMS)。对于PCS和ci，我们建模具体的角色和策略。对于IdMS，我们通过使用Soot分析框架和模型转换技术(QVTo)从字节码中重构访问控制策略，来深入评估我们的分析方法。由此产生的模型帮助我们识别设计缺陷。违反OCL不变量(如互斥角色或基数约束)揭示了重要的安全漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 多模型访问控制属性的有效验证

papers.title: Efficient and Extensible Policy Mining for Relationship-Based Access Control
papers.authors: Thang Bui, Scott D. Stoller, Hieu Le
papers.abstract: Relationship-based access control (ReBAC) is a flexible and expressive framework that allows policies to be expressed in terms of chains of relationship between entities as well as attributes of entities. ReBAC policy mining algorithms have a potential to significantly reduce the cost of migration from legacy access control systems to ReBAC, by partially automating the development of a ReBAC policy. Existing ReBAC policy mining algorithms support a policy language with a limited set of operators; this limits their applicability. This paper presents a ReBAC policy mining algorithm designed to be both (1) easily extensible (to support additional policy language features) and (2) scalable. The algorithm is based on Bui et al.'s evolutionary algorithm for ReBAC policy mining algorithm. First, we simplify their algorithm, in order to make it easier to extend and provide a methodology that extends it to handle new policy language features. However, extending the policy language increases the search space of candidate policies explored by the evolutionary algorithm, thus causes longer running time and/or worse results. To address the problem, we enhance the algorithm with a feature selection phase. The enhancement utilizes a neural network to identify useful features. We use the result of feature selection to reduce the evolutionary algorithm's search space. The new algorithm is easy to extend and, as shown by our experiments, is more efficient and produces better policies.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于关系的访问控制(ReBAC)是一个灵活的表达框架，它允许用实体之间的关系链以及实体的属性来表达策略。通过部分自动化ReBAC策略的开发，ReBAC策略挖掘算法具有显著降低从遗留访问控制系统到ReBAC的迁移成本的潜力。现有的ReBAC策略挖掘算法支持具有有限运算符集的策略语言；这限制了它们的适用性。本文提出了一个ReBAC策略挖掘算法，该算法被设计成(1)易于扩展(以支持附加的策略语言特性)和(2)可伸缩。该算法基于Bui等人的ReBAC策略挖掘算法的进化算法。首先，我们简化了他们的算法，以便更容易扩展，并提供一种方法来扩展它以处理新的策略语言特性。然而，扩展策略语言增加了进化算法探索的候选策略的搜索空间，从而导致更长的运行时间和/或更差的结果。为了解决这个问题，我们用特征选择阶段来增强算法。该增强利用神经网络来识别有用的特征。我们利用特征选择的结果来缩小进化算法的搜索空间。我们的实验表明，新算法易于扩展，效率更高，产生的策略也更好。
papers.title_zh: 基于关系的访问控制的高效可扩展策略挖掘

papers.title: A Rule-based Approach to the Decidability of Safety of ABACα
papers.authors: Mircea Marin, Temur Kutsia, Besik Dundua
papers.abstract: ABACα is a foundational model for attribute-based access control with a minimal set of capabilities to configure many access control models of interest, including the dominant traditional ones: discretionary (DAC), mandatory (MAC), and role-based (RBAC). A fundamental security problem in the design of ABAC is to ensure safety, that is, to guarantee that a certain subject can never gain certain permissions to access certain object(s). We propose a rule-based specification of ABACα and of its configurations, and the semantic framework of ρLog to turn this specification into executable code for the operational model of ABACα. Next, we identify some important properties of the operational model which allow us to define a rule-based algorithm for the safety problem, and to execute it with ρLog. The outcome is a practical tool to check safety of ABACα configurations. ρLog is a system for rule-based programming with strategies and built-in support for constraint logic programming (CLP). We argue that ρLog is an adequate framework for the specification and verification of safety of ABACα configurations. In particular, the authorization policies of ABACα can be interpreted properly by the CLP component of ρLog, and the operations of its functional specification can be described by five strategies defined by conditional rewrite rules.
papers.abstract_zh: ABACα是基于属性的访问控制的基础模型，它提供了一组最少的功能来配置许多感兴趣的访问控制模型，包括主流的传统模型:自主(DAC)、强制(MAC)和基于角色(RBAC)。ABAC设计中的一个基本安全问题是确保安全，即保证某个主体永远不能获得访问某个对象的权限。我们提出了ABACα及其配置的基于规则的规范，以及ρLog的语义框架，以将该规范转化为ABACα操作模型的可执行代码。接下来，我们确定操作模型的一些重要属性，这些属性允许我们为安全问题定义基于规则的算法，并使用ρLog来执行它。其结果是检验ABACα构型安全性的实用工具。ρLog是一个基于规则编程的系统，具有策略和对约束逻辑编程(CLP)的内置支持。我们认为ρLog是说明和验证ABACα构型安全性的适当框架。特别地，ABACα的授权策略可以由ρLog的CLP组件正确解释，其功能规范的操作可以由条件重写规则定义的五种策略描述。
papers.title_zh: 基于规则的ABACα安全性判定方法

papers.title: Bounded and Approximate Strong Satisfiability in Workflows
papers.authors: Jason Crampton, Gregory Z. Gutin, Diptapriyo Majumdar
papers.abstract: There has been a considerable amount of interest in recent years in the problem of workflow satisfiability, which asks whether the existence of constraints in a workflow specification makes it impossible to allocate authorized users to each step in the workflow. Recent developments have seen the workflow satisfiability problem (WSP) studied in the context of workflow specifications in which the set of steps may vary from one instance of the workflow to another. This, in turn, means that some constraints may only apply to certain workflow instances. Inevitably, WSP becomes more complex for such workflow specifications. Other approaches have considered the possibility of associating costs with the violation of "soft'' constraints and authorizations. Workflow satisfiability in this context becomes a question of minimizing the cost of allocating users to steps in the workflow. In this paper, we introduce new problems, which we believe to be of practical relevance, that combine these approaches. In particular, we consider the question of whether, given a workflow specification with costs and a "budget'', all possible workflow instances have an allocation of users to steps that does not exceed the budget. We design a fixed-parameter tractable algorithm to solve this problem parameterized by the total number of steps, release points and xor branchings.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，人们对工作流可满足性问题产生了相当大的兴趣，该问题询问工作流规范中约束的存在是否使得不可能将授权用户分配到工作流中的每个步骤。最近的发展已经看到在工作流规范的背景下研究工作流可满足性问题(WSP ),在工作流规范中，一组步骤可以从工作流的一个实例变化到另一个实例。这反过来意味着一些约束可能只适用于某些工作流实例。对于这样的工作流规范，WSP不可避免地变得更加复杂。其他方法考虑了将成本与违反“软”约束和授权联系起来的可能性。在这种情况下，工作流可满足性变成了一个最小化分配用户到工作流中的步骤的成本的问题。在这篇论文中，我们介绍了新的问题，我们认为这些问题具有实际意义，结合了这些方法。特别地，我们考虑这样一个问题:给定一个带有成本和“预算”的工作流规范，是否所有可能的工作流实例都有一个不超过预算的步骤用户分配。我们设计了一个固定参数的易处理算法来解决这个问题，该算法由步骤总数、释放点和xor分支来参数化。
papers.title_zh: 工作流中的有界和近似强可满足性

papers.title: Using Provenance for Secure Data Fusion in Cooperative Systems
papers.authors: Clara Bertolissi, Jerry den Hartog, Nicola Zannone
papers.abstract: In the context of cooperative systems, data coming from multiple, autonomous, heterogeneous information sources, is processed and fused into new pieces of information that can be further processed by other entities participating in the cooperation. Controlling the access to such evolving and variegated data, often under the authority of different entities, is challenging. In this work, we identify a set of access control requirements for multi-source cooperative systems and propose an attribute-based access control model where provenance information is used to specify access constraints that account for both the evolution of data objects and the process of data fusion. We demonstrate the feasibility of the proposed model by showing how it can be implemented within existing access control mechanisms with minimal changes.
papers.abstract_zh: 在协作系统的环境中，来自多个自治异构信息源的数据被处理并融合成新的信息片段，这些新的信息片段可由参与协作的其他实体进一步处理。通常在不同实体的授权下，控制对这种不断发展和多样化的数据的访问是具有挑战性的。在本文中，我们确定了一组多源协作系统的访问控制需求，并提出了一个基于属性的访问控制模型，其中源信息用于指定访问约束，这些约束考虑了数据对象的演化和数据融合过程。我们通过展示如何在现有的访问控制机制中以最小的改变来实现所提出的模型，来证明该模型的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 协同系统中使用起源进行安全数据融合

papers.title: Effectively Enforcing Authorization Constraints for Emerging Space-Sensitive Technologies
papers.authors: Carlos E. Rubio-Medrano, Shaishavkumar Jogani, Maria Leitner, Ziming Zhao, Gail-Joon Ahn
papers.abstract: Recently, applications that deliver customized content to end-users, e.g., digital objects on top of a video stream, depending on information such as their current physical location, usage patterns, personal data, etc., have become extremely popular. Despite their promising future, some concerns still exist with respect to the proper use of such space-sensitive applications (S-Apps) inside independently-run physical spaces, e.g., schools, museums, hospitals, memorials, etc. Based on the idea that innovative technologies should be paired with novel (and effective) security measures, this paper proposes space-sensitive access control (SSAC), an approach for restricting space-sensitive functionality in such independently-run physical spaces, allowing for the specification, evaluation and enforcement of rich and flexible authorization policies, which, besides meeting the specific needs for S-Apps, are also intended to avoid the need for interruptions in their normal use as well as repetitive policy updates, thus providing a convenient solution for both policy makers and end-users. We present a theoretical model, a proof-of-concept S-App, and a supporting API framework, which facilitate the policy crafting, storage, retrieval and evaluation processes, as well as the enforcement of authorization decisions. In addition, we present a performance case study depicting our proof-of-concept S-App in a set of realistic scenarios, as well as a user study which resulted in 90% of participants being able to understand and write authorization policies using our approach, and 93% of them also recognizing the need for restricting functionality in the context of emerging space-sensitive technologies, thus providing evidence that encourages the adoption of SSAC in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，根据诸如终端用户的当前物理位置、使用模式、个人数据等信息，向终端用户传送定制内容(例如，视频流顶部的数字对象)的应用。，已经变得非常受欢迎。尽管前景看好，但对于在独立运营的物理空间(如学校、博物馆、医院、纪念馆等)内适当使用此类空间敏感应用程序(S-app ),仍存在一些担忧。基于创新技术应该与新的(有效的)安全措施相结合的思想，本文提出了空间敏感访问控制(SSAC)，一种在独立运行的物理空间中限制空间敏感功能的方法，允许规范、评估和执行丰富灵活的授权策略，除了满足S-app的特定需求外，还旨在避免中断其正常使用以及重复的策略更新，从而为决策者和最终用户提供方便的解决方案。我们提出了一个理论模型、一个概念验证S-App和一个支持API框架，它们有助于策略的制定、存储、检索和评估过程，以及授权决策的实施。此外，我们还展示了一个性能案例研究，描述了我们在一组现实场景中的概念验证S-App，以及一项用户研究，该研究使90%的参与者能够使用我们的方法理解和编写授权策略，其中93%的参与者还认识到在新兴空间敏感技术的背景下限制功能的必要性，从而提供了鼓励在实践中采用SSAC的证据。
papers.title_zh: 有效实施对新兴空间敏感技术的授权限制

papers.title: CMCAP: Ephemeral Sandboxes for Adaptive Access Control
papers.authors: Theogene Hakiza Bucuti, Ram Dantu, Kirill Morozov
papers.abstract: We present CMCAP (context-mapped capabilities), a decentralized mechanism for specifying and enforcing adaptive access control policies for resource-centric security. Policies in CMCAP express runtime constraints defined as containment domains with context-mapped capabilities, and ephemeral sandboxes for dynamically enforcing desired information flow properties while preserving functional correctness for the sandboxed programs. CMCAP is designed to remediate DAC's weakness and address the inflexibility that makes current MAC frameworks impractical to the common user. We use a Linux-based implementation of CMCAP to demonstrate how a program's dynamic profile is used for access control and intrusion prevention.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了CMCAP(上下文映射能力)，这是一种为以资源为中心的安全性指定和实施自适应访问控制策略的分散机制。CMCAP中的策略表达了被定义为具有上下文映射能力的包容域的运行时约束，以及用于动态实施期望的信息流属性同时保持沙箱程序的功能正确性的短暂沙箱。CMCAP旨在弥补DAC的不足，并解决使当前MAC框架对普通用户不切实际的不灵活性。我们使用一个基于Linux的CMCAP实现来演示程序的动态配置文件如何用于访问控制和入侵防御。
papers.title_zh: CMCAP:用于自适应访问控制的短暂沙箱

papers.title: Mutual Authorizations: Semantics and Integration Issues
papers.authors: Gabriela Suntaxi, Aboubakr Achraf El Ghazi, Klemens Böhm
papers.abstract: Studies in fields like psychology and sociology have revealed that reciprocity is a powerful determinant of human behavior. None of the existing access control models however captures this reciprocity phenomenon. In this paper, we introduce a new kind of grant, which we call mutual, to express authorizations that actually do this, i.e., users grant access to their resources only to users who allow them access to theirs. We define the syntax and semantics of mutual authorizations and show how this new grant can be included in the Role-Based Access Control model, i.e., extend RBAC with it.
papers.abstract_zh: 心理学和社会学等领域的研究表明，互惠是人类行为的一个强有力的决定因素。然而，现有的访问控制模型都没有捕捉到这种互易现象。在本文中，我们引入了一种新的授权，我们称之为相互授权，以表达真正做到这一点的授权，即用户只向允许他们访问其资源的用户授予对其资源的访问权。我们定义了相互授权的语法和语义，并展示了如何将这种新的授权包含在基于角色的访问控制模型中，即，用它来扩展RBAC。
papers.title_zh: 相互授权:语义和集成问题

papers.title: CloudProtect - A Cloud-based Software Protection Service
papers.authors: Andreas Schaad, Björn Grohmann, Oliver Winzenried
papers.abstract: Protecting software from illegal access, intentional modification or reverse engineering is an inherently difficult practical problem involving code obfuscation techniques and real-time cryptographic protection of code. In traditional systems a secure element (the "dongle") is used to protect software. However, this approach suffers from several technical and economical drawbacks such as the dongle being lost or broken. We present a system that provides such dongles as a cloud service, and more importantly, provides the required cryptographic material to control access to software functionality in real-time. This system is developed as part of an ongoing nationally funded research project and is now entering a first trial stage with stakeholders from different industrial sectors.
papers.abstract_zh: 保护软件免受非法访问、故意修改或逆向工程是一个固有的困难的实际问题，涉及代码混淆技术和代码的实时密码保护。在传统系统中，安全元件(“加密狗”)用于保护软件。然而，这种方法有几个技术和经济上的缺点，例如加密狗丢失或损坏。我们提出了一个系统，它提供了像云服务这样的加密狗，更重要的是，它提供了所需的加密材料来实时控制对软件功能的访问。该系统是作为一个正在进行的国家资助的研究项目的一部分开发的，目前正与不同工业部门的利益攸关方一起进入第一个试验阶段。
papers.title_zh: CloudProtect -基于云的软件保护服务

papers.title: Poster: A Pluggable Authentication Module for Big Data Federation Architecture
papers.authors: Feras M. Awaysheh, José Carlos Cabaleiro, Tomás F. Pena, Mamoun Alazab
papers.abstract: This paper intends to propose a trustworthy model for authenticating users and services over a Big Data Federation deployment architecture. The main goal of this model is to provide a Single-Sign-on (SSO) approach for the latest Hadoop 3.x platform. To achieve this, a conceptual model is proposed combining Hadoop access control primitives and the Apache Knox framework. The paper provides various insights regarding the latest ongoing developments and open challenges in this domain.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文旨在提出一种可信模型，用于在大数据联合部署架构上认证用户和服务。该模型的主要目标是为最新的Hadoop 3.x平台提供单点登录(SSO)方法。为了实现这一点，提出了一个结合Hadoop访问控制原语和Apache Knox框架的概念模型。该文件提供了关于该领域最新发展和公开挑战的各种见解。
papers.title_zh: 海报:大数据联盟架构的可插拔认证模块

papers.title: Verifying OAuth Implementations Through Encrypted Network Analysis
papers.authors: Josh Talkington, Ram Dantu, Kirill Morozov
papers.abstract: Verifying protocol implementations via application analysis can be cumbersome. Rapid development cycles of both the protocol and applications that use it can hinder up-to-date analysis. A better approach is to use formal models to characterize the applications platform and then verify the protocol through analysis of the network traffic tied to the models. To test this method, the popular protocol OAuth is considered. Currently, formal models of OAuth do not take into consideration the mobile environment, and implementation verification is largely based on code analysis. Our preliminary results are two fold; we sketch an extension to a formal model that incorporates the specifics of the Android platform and classify OAuth device types using machine learning on encrypted VPN traffic.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过应用程序分析来验证协议实现可能很麻烦。协议和应用程序的快速开发周期会阻碍最新的分析。更好的方法是使用正式模型来描述应用程序平台，然后通过分析与模型相关的网络流量来验证协议。为了测试这种方法，考虑流行的协议OAuth。目前，OAuth的形式化模型没有考虑移动环境，实现验证主要基于代码分析。我们的初步结果有两个方面:我们草拟了一个正式模型的扩展，它包含了Android平台的细节，并使用加密VPN流量的机器学习对OAuth设备类型进行分类。
papers.title_zh: 通过加密网络分析验证OAuth实现

papers.title: Poster: Unified Access Control for Surgical Robotics
papers.authors: Ryan Shah, Shishir Nagaraja
papers.title_zh: 海报:手术机器人的统一访问控制

papers.title: Distributed Intelligence: Trends in the Management of Complex Systems
papers.authors: Seraphin B. Calo, Dinesh C. Verma, Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: The ability to incorporate intelligence in even small devices and to make use of contextual information from widely deployed sensors has already begun to change management paradigms. As edge computing and IoT become more prevalent, systems will increasingly consist of cooperating, heterogeneous, distributed, autonomous elements. Architectures for cognitive, collaborative systems are evolving to deal with such complex environments. Concepts from multi-agent systems and autonomic computing are being applied to cope with the scope and breadth of large collections of interacting devices and services. Technologies for security and access control must evolve as well. Policy-based mechanisms are widely used and have been very successful in protecting information and controlling access to systems and services. They tend to rely, however, on a centralized infrastructure and on the automated enforcement of directives. Newer paradigms are being investigated that allow policy structures to be more dynamic and contextual, while still preserving the desired levels of control. We will present trends in the evolution of architectures for distributed, federated systems, and the technologies for managing them.
papers.abstract_zh: 将智能融入小型设备并利用来自广泛部署的传感器的上下文信息的能力已经开始改变管理模式。随着边缘计算和物联网变得越来越普遍，系统将越来越多地由协作、异构、分布式、自治的元素组成。认知、协作系统的架构正在发展，以应对这种复杂的环境。来自多代理系统和自主计算的概念正被应用于处理大量交互设备和服务的范围和广度。安全和访问控制技术也必须发展。基于策略的机制被广泛使用，并且在保护信息和控制对系统和服务的访问方面非常成功。然而，他们倾向于依赖于集中的基础设施和指令的自动执行。正在研究新的范例，使政策结构更具动态性和背景性，同时仍然保持所需的控制水平。我们将展示分布式联邦系统的架构发展趋势，以及管理它们的技术。
papers.title_zh: 分布式智能:复杂系统管理的趋势

papers.title: A Flexible Authorization Architecture for Systems of Interoperable Medical Devices
papers.authors: Qais Tasali, Chandan Chowdhury, Eugene Y. Vasserman
papers.abstract: Robust authentication and authorization are vital to next-generation distributed medical systems - the Medical Internet of Things (MIoT). However, there is yet no good authorization model for real-time multi-channel data from systems of heterogeneous devices providing multiple physiological parameters for clinicians who may change on a minute-by-minute basis. We present a flexible authorization architecture for interoperable medical systems, and an implementation and evaluation in the context of the Medical Device Coordination Framework (MDCF) high-assurance middleware. Our framework is based on the well-studied Attributed Based Access Control model, but we introduce a new method of attribute inheritance that provides more fine-grained access control, supporting multiple different authorization levels for multiple physiological data channels from the same device, and rich and expressive policy specification which facilitates plug-and-play connectivity of devices - most do not require pre-specification of individual permissions. Our architecture is standards-compliant and modular, using the eXtensible Access Control Markup Language (XACML), and Axiomatics Language for Authorization (ALFA) for policy specification, and standalone authorization modules which can be integrated with other platforms such as OpenICE. We stress-test our implementation in a realistic distributed system configuration, and show that the unoptimized system introduces negligible network and storage overhead, and minimal memory and CPU overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 健壮的认证和授权对于下一代分布式医疗系统——医疗物联网(MIoT)至关重要。然而，对于来自异构设备系统的实时多通道数据，还没有好的授权模型，该异构设备系统为可能每分钟都在变化的临床医生提供多个生理参数。我们提出了一种灵活的可互操作医疗系统的授权架构，以及在医疗设备协调框架(MDCF)高保证中间件环境下的实现和评估。我们的框架基于经过充分研究的基于属性的访问控制模型，但我们引入了一种新的属性继承方法，该方法提供了更细粒度的访问控制，支持来自同一设备的多个生理数据通道的多个不同授权级别，以及丰富而富有表现力的策略规范，该规范有助于设备的即插即用连接——大多数不需要预先指定个人权限。我们的架构是符合标准的模块化架构，使用可扩展访问控制标记语言(XACML)和用于策略规范的授权公理语言(ALFA ),以及可以与OpenICE等其他平台集成的独立授权模块。我们在一个实际的分布式系统配置中对我们的实现进行了压力测试，结果表明，未优化的系统引入的网络和存储开销可以忽略不计，内存和CPU开销也非常少。
papers.title_zh: 用于可互操作医疗设备系统的灵活授权架构

papers.title: Uncoupling Biometrics from Templates for Secure and Privacy-Preserving Authentication
papers.authors: Aysajan Abidin, Enrique Argones-Rúa, Roel Peeters
papers.abstract: Biometrics are widely used for authentication in several domains, services and applications. However, only very few systems succeed in effectively combining highly secure user authentication with an adequate privacy protection of the biometric templates, due to the difficulty associated with jointly providing good authentication performance, unlinkability and irreversibility to biometric templates. This thwarts the use of biometrics in remote authentication scenarios, despite the advantages that this kind of architectures provides. We propose a user-specific approach for decoupling the biometrics from their binary representation before using biometric protection schemes based on fuzzy extractors. This allows for more reliable, flexible, irreversible and unlinkable protected biometric templates. With the proposed biometrics decoupling procedures, biometric metadata, that does not allow to recover the original biometric template, is generated. However, different biometric metadata that are generated starting from the same biometric template remain statistically linkable, therefore we propose to additionally protect these using a second authentication factor (e.g., knowledge or possession based). We demonstrate the potential of this approach within a two-factor authentication protocol for remote biometric authentication in mobile scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 生物特征被广泛用于多个领域、服务和应用中的认证。然而，只有极少数系统成功地将高度安全的用户认证与生物特征模板的充分隐私保护有效地结合起来，这是由于与联合提供良好的认证性能、生物特征模板的不可链接性和不可逆性相关联的困难。尽管这种体系结构提供了优势，但这阻碍了生物识别在远程认证场景中的使用。我们提出了一种用户特定的方法，在使用基于模糊提取器的生物特征保护方案之前，将生物特征与其二进制表示解耦。这允许更可靠、灵活、不可逆和不可链接的受保护生物特征模板。利用所提出的生物特征分离过程，生成了不允许恢复原始生物特征模板的生物特征元数据。然而，从同一生物特征模板生成的不同生物特征元数据保持统计可链接，因此我们建议使用第二认证因素(例如，基于知识或所有权)来额外保护这些。我们展示了这种方法在双因素认证协议中的潜力，用于移动场景中的远程生物认证。
papers.title_zh: 将生物识别与模板分离，以实现安全、隐私保护的身份认证

papers.title: On Risk in Access Control Enforcement
papers.authors: Giuseppe Petracca, Frank Capobianco, Christian Skalka, Trent Jaeger
papers.abstract: While we have long had principles describing how access control enforcement should be implemented, such as the reference monitor concept, imprecision in access control mechanisms and access control policies leads to risks that may enable exploitation. In practice, least privilege access control policies often allow information flows that may enable exploits. In addition, the implementation of access control mechanisms often tries to balance security with ease of use implicitly (e.g., with respect to determining where to place authorization hooks) and approaches to tighten access control, such as accounting for program context, are ad hoc. In this paper, we define four types of risks in access control enforcement and explore possible approaches and challenges in tracking those types of risks. In principle, we advocate runtime tracking to produce risk estimates for each of these types of risk. To better understand the potential of risk estimation for authorization, we propose risk estimate functions for each of the four types of risk, finding that benign program deployments accumulate risks in each of the four areas for ten Android programs examined. As a result, we find that tracking of relative risk may be useful for guiding changes to security choices, such as authorized unsafe operations or placement of authorization checks, when risk differs from that expected.
papers.abstract_zh: 虽然我们早就有了描述应该如何实施访问控制实施的原则，例如引用监视器概念，但访问控制机制和访问控制策略的不精确性会导致可能被利用的风险。实际上，最低特权访问控制策略通常允许可能导致漏洞的信息流。此外，访问控制机制的实现通常试图隐式地平衡安全性与易用性(例如，关于确定在何处放置授权挂钩)，并且诸如考虑程序上下文之类的加强访问控制的方法是特别的。在本文中，我们定义了访问控制实施中的四种风险类型，并探讨了跟踪这些风险类型的可能方法和挑战。原则上，我们提倡运行时跟踪来为每种类型的风险产生风险估计。为了更好地理解授权风险评估的潜力，我们为四种风险类型中的每一种提出了风险评估函数，发现良性的程序部署会在所研究的十个Android程序的四个领域中的每一个领域中累积风险。因此，我们发现，当风险与预期不同时，跟踪相对风险可能有助于指导安全选择的变化，例如授权的不安全操作或授权检查的放置。
papers.title_zh: 论访问控制实施中的风险

papers.title: FACT: Functionality-centric Access Control System for IoT Programming Frameworks
papers.authors: Sanghak Lee, Jiwon Choi, Jihun Kim, Beumjin Cho, Sangho Lee, Hanjun Kim, Jong Kim
papers.abstract: Improvement in the security and availability is important for the success of the Internet of Things (IoT). Given that recent IoT devices are likely to have multiple functionalities and support third-party applications, this goal becomes challenging to achieve. Through an in-depth investigation of existing IoT frameworks, we focused on two inherent security flaws in their design caused by their device-centric approaches: (1) coarse-grained access control and (2) lack of resource isolation. Because of the coarse-grained access control, IoT devices suffer from over-privileged applications. Furthermore, the lack of resource isolation allows the possibility of Denial-of-Service attacks. In this paper, we propose a functionality-centric approach to manage IoT devices, called FACT, which has two design goals, namely, the principle of least privilege and the availability in terms of device functionalities. FACT isolates each functionality of the device using Linux Containers and grants a subject the privilege to access for each required functionality. We provide the overall framework and detailed working procedures between components that constitute FACT. We built a prototype of FACT on IoTivity and show that it accomplishes secure and efficient linkages between applications and functionalities of IoT devices through analysis and experiments.
papers.abstract_zh: 提高安全性和可用性对于物联网的成功至关重要。鉴于最近的物联网设备可能具有多种功能并支持第三方应用，这一目标变得难以实现。通过对现有物联网框架的深入调查，我们重点关注了其设计中由以设备为中心的方法导致的两个固有安全缺陷:(1)粗粒度访问控制和(2)缺乏资源隔离。由于粗粒度的访问控制，物联网设备受到过度特权应用的困扰。此外，缺乏资源隔离使得拒绝服务攻击成为可能。在本文中，我们提出了一种以功能为中心的方法来管理物联网设备，称为FACT，它有两个设计目标，即最小特权原则和设备功能方面的可用性。FACT使用Linux容器隔离设备的每个功能，并授予主体访问每个所需功能的权限。我们提供构成事实的组件之间的总体框架和详细的工作程序。我们构建了一个基于物联网的FACT原型，并通过分析和实验表明，它实现了物联网设备的应用和功能之间的安全高效的链接。
papers.title_zh: 事实:物联网编程框架的以功能为中心的访问控制系统

papers.title: An Enforcement Model for Preventing Inference Attacks in Social Computing Platforms
papers.authors: Seyed Hossein Ahmadinejad, Philip W. L. Fong
papers.abstract: Social Network Systems (SNSs) allow third-party extensions to access user profiles by providing an Application Programming Interface (API). It has been demonstrated in the literature that this API can be exploited by malicious extensions to infer users' sensitive information from the information that is accessible through the API. To prevent this type of privacy violation, we propose a view-based protection model, in which a sanitizing transformation, called a view, is applied to the user profile when it is queried by a third-party extension. We demonstrate empirically that such a protection mechanism effectively reduces the statistical correlation between sensitive and accessible information. We also propose an optimization in which the materialization of views is performed lazily: rather than sanitizing the entire profile during a query, only the parts of the profile that are visible to the query are transformed. We demonstrate empirically that this optimization offers visible performance advantage, and propose a programming language-independent, probabilistic automata model for encoding such transformations.
papers.abstract_zh: 社交网络系统(SNS)允许第三方扩展通过提供应用编程接口(API)来访问用户简档。文献已经证明，恶意扩展可以利用该API从可通过该API访问的信息中推断出用户的敏感信息。为了防止这种类型的隐私侵犯，我们提出了一种基于视图的保护模型，在该模型中，当第三方扩展查询用户简档时，对用户简档应用称为视图的净化转换。我们从经验上证明，这种保护机制有效地降低了敏感信息和可访问信息之间的统计相关性。我们还提出了一种优化方法，其中视图的具体化是延迟执行的:不是在查询期间净化整个概要文件，而是只转换查询可见的部分概要文件。我们从经验上证明了这种优化提供了明显的性能优势，并提出了一种独立于编程语言的概率自动机模型来编码这种转换。
papers.title_zh: 社交计算平台中防止推理攻击的实施模型

papers.title: Secure Pick Up: Implicit Authentication When You Start Using the Smartphone
papers.authors: Wei-Han Lee, Xiaochen Liu, Yilin Shen, Hongxia Jin, Ruby B. Lee
papers.abstract: We propose Secure Pick Up (SPU), a convenient, lightweight, in-device, non-intrusive and automatic-learning system for smartphone user authentication. Operating in the background, our system implicitly observes users' phone pick-up movements, the way they bend their arms when they pick up a smartphone to interact with the device, to authenticate the users. Our SPU outperforms the state-of-the-art implicit authentication mechanisms in three main aspects: 1) SPU automatically learns the user's behavioral pattern without requiring a large amount of training data (especially those of other users) as previous methods did, making it more deployable. Towards this end, we propose a weighted multi-dimensional Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) algorithm to effectively quantify similarities between users' pick-up movements; 2) SPU does not rely on a remote server for providing further computational power, making SPU efficient and usable even without network access; and 3) our system can adaptively update a user's authentication model to accommodate user's behavioral drift over time with negligible overhead. Through extensive experiments on real world datasets, we demonstrate that SPU can achieve authentication accuracy up to 96.3% with a very low latency of 2.4% milliseconds. It reduces the number of times a user has to do explicit authentication by 32.9%, while effectively defending against various attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了安全拾取(SPU)，一种用于智能手机用户认证的方便、轻量、设备内、非侵入和自动学习的系统。我们的系统在后台运行，暗中观察用户拿起手机的动作，他们拿起智能手机与设备交互时弯曲手臂的方式，以验证用户身份。我们的SPU在三个主要方面优于最先进的隐式认证机制:1) SPU自动学习用户的行为模式，而不像以前的方法那样需要大量的训练数据(特别是其他用户的数据)，使其更具可部署性。为此，我们提出了一种加权多维动态时间弯曲(DTW)算法，以有效量化用户拾取运动之间的相似性；2) SPU不依赖于远程服务器来提供进一步的计算能力，使得SPU即使在没有网络接入的情况下也是高效和可用的；以及3)我们的系统可以自适应地更新用户的认证模型以适应用户的行为随时间的漂移，而开销可以忽略不计。通过在真实世界数据集上的大量实验，我们证明了SPU可以以2.4%毫秒的极低延迟实现高达96.3%的认证准确率。它将用户必须进行显式身份认证的次数减少了32.9%，同时有效防御各种攻击。
papers.title_zh: 安全拾取:开始使用智能手机时的隐式身份验证

papers.title: Attribute Expressions, Policy Tables and Attribute-Based Access Control
papers.authors: Jason Crampton, Conrad Williams
papers.abstract: Attribute-based access control (ABAC) has attracted considerable interest in recent years, prompting the development of the standardized XML-based language XACML. ABAC policies written in languages like XACML have a tree-like structure, where leaf nodes are associated with authorization decisions and non-leaf nodes are associated with decision-combining algorithms. However, it may be difficult in XACML to construct a given policy due to the tree-structured nature of XACML and the way in which combining algorithms are defined. Furthermore, there is limited control over how requests are evaluated with respect to targets. In this paper, we introduce the notion of an attribute expression, which generalizes the notion of a target, and show how attribute expressions are used to specify policies in tabular form. We demonstrate why representing policies in this manner is convenient, intuitive and flexible for policy authors, and provide a method for automatically compiling policy tables into machine-enforceable policies. Thus, we bridge the gap between a policy representation that is convenient for end-users and a policy that can be enforced by a PDP. We then describe various methods to reduce the size of policy tables. In addition, we compare our language with XACML, highlighting various shortcomings of XACML and demonstrating how to express XACML policies in a tabular form. We then show how policy tables can be used as leaf nodes in a tree-structured language, providing a modular method for constructing enterprise-wide policies. Finally, we show how attribute expressions and policy tables can be used to make role-based access control and access control lists "attribute-aware".
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)引起了人们极大的兴趣，推动了基于XML的标准化语言XACML的发展。用XACML等语言编写的ABAC策略有一个树状结构，其中叶节点与授权决策相关联，非叶节点与决策组合算法相关联。但是，由于XACML的树结构特性和组合算法的定义方式，在XACML中构建给定的策略可能很困难。此外，对于如何相对于目标评估请求的控制是有限的。在本文中，我们引入了属性表达式的概念，它概括了目标的概念，并以表格的形式展示了如何使用属性表达式来指定策略。我们展示了为什么以这种方式表示策略对于策略作者来说是方便、直观和灵活的，并提供了一种将策略表自动编译成机器可执行的策略的方法。因此，我们在方便最终用户的策略表示和可由PDP实施的策略之间架起了一座桥梁。然后，我们描述了减少策略表大小的各种方法。此外，我们将我们的语言与XACML进行了比较，强调了XACML的各种缺点，并演示了如何以表格形式表达XACML策略。然后，我们展示了如何将策略表用作树形结构语言中的叶节点，为构建企业范围的策略提供了一种模块化方法。最后，我们展示了如何使用属性表达式和策略表来实现基于角色的访问控制和访问控制列表的“属性感知”。
papers.title_zh: 属性表达式、策略表和基于属性的访问控制

papers.title: A Datalog Framework for Modeling Relationship-based Access Control Policies
papers.authors: Edelmira Pasarella, Jorge Lobo
papers.abstract: Relationships like friendship to limit access to resources have been part of social network applications since their beginnings. Describing access control policies in terms of relationships is not particular to social networks and it arises naturally in many situations. Hence, we have recently seen several proposals formalizing different Relationship-based Access Control (ReBAC) models. In this paper, we introduce a class of Datalog programs suitable for modeling ReBAC and argue that this class of programs, that we called ReBAC Datalog policies, provides a very general framework to specify and implement ReBAC policies. To support our claim, we first formalize the merging of two recent proposals for modeling ReBAC, one based on hybrid logic and the other one based on path regular expressions. We present extensions to handle negative authorizations and temporal policies. We describe mechanism for policy analysis, and then discuss the feasibility of using Datalog-based systems as implementations.
papers.abstract_zh: 像友谊这样限制资源访问的关系从一开始就是社交网络应用的一部分。根据关系来描述访问控制策略并不是社交网络所特有的，它在许多情况下都会自然出现。因此，我们最近看到了几个正式化不同的基于关系的访问控制(ReBAC)模型的提案。在本文中，我们介绍了一类适用于建模ReBAC的Datalog程序，并认为这类程序，我们称之为ReBAC Datalog策略，提供了一个非常通用的框架来指定和实现ReBAC策略。为了支持我们的主张，我们首先形式化了最近两个ReBAC建模提案的合并，一个基于混合逻辑，另一个基于路径正则表达式。我们提出了处理否定授权和时态策略的扩展。我们描述策略分析的机制，然后讨论使用基于Datalog的系统作为实现的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 基于关系的访问控制策略建模的Datalog框架

papers.title: Towards a Top-down Policy Engineering Framework for Attribute-based Access Control
papers.authors: Masoud Narouei, Hamed Khanpour, Hassan Takabi, Natalie Parde, Rodney D. Nielsen
papers.abstract: Attribute-based access control (ABAC) is a logical access control methodology where authorization to perform a set of operations is based on attributes of the user, the objects being accessed, the environment, and a number of other attribute sources that may be relevant to the current request. Once fully implemented within an enterprise, ABAC promotes information sharing while maintaining control of the information. However, the cost of developing ABAC policies can be a significant obstacle for organizations to migrate from traditional access control models to ABAC. Most organizations have high-level requirement specifications that define security policies and include a set of access control policies. Taking advantage of this rich source of information, we introduce a top-down policy engineering framework for ABAC that aims to automatically extract policies from unrestricted natural language documents and then, we present our methodology to extract policy related information using deep neural networks. We first create an annotated dataset comprised of 2660 sentences from real-world policy documents. We then train a deep recurrent neural network (RNN) to identify sentences containing access control policies (ACP) from irrelevant content. We applied the RNN to our new dataset as well as to five other, smaller datasets that have been employed in prior work on this task, and show that our model outperforms the state-of-the-art and leads to a performance improvement of 5.58% over the previously reported results.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)是一种逻辑访问控制方法，在这种方法中，执行一组操作的授权是基于用户的属性、被访问的对象、环境以及可能与当前请求相关的许多其他属性源。一旦在企业中完全实施，ABAC将促进信息共享，同时保持对信息的控制。但是，开发ABAC策略的成本可能是组织从传统访问控制模型迁移到ABAC的一个重大障碍。大多数组织都有定义安全策略并包含一组访问控制策略的高级需求规范。利用这一丰富的信息源，我们介绍了一个自顶向下的ABAC策略工程框架，旨在从无限制的自然语言文档中自动提取策略，然后，我们提出了使用深度神经网络提取策略相关信息的方法。我们首先从现实世界的政策文档中创建一个包含2660个句子的带注释的数据集。然后，我们训练一个深度递归神经网络(RNN)，从无关内容中识别包含访问控制策略(ACP)的句子。我们将RNN应用于我们的新数据集以及在此任务的先前工作中使用的其他五个较小的数据集，并显示我们的模型优于最先进的模型，并导致性能比先前报告的结果提高了5.58%。
papers.title_zh: 面向基于属性的访问控制的自顶向下策略工程框架

papers.title: Poster: A Location-Privacy Approach for Continuous Queries
papers.authors: Douglas Steiert, Dan Lin, Quincy Conduff, Wei Jiang
papers.abstract: With the prevalence of smartphones, mobile apps have become more and more popular. However, many mobile apps request location information of the user. If there is nothing in place for location privacy, these mobile app users are in great risk of being tracked by malicious parties. Although the location privacy problem has been studied extensively by resorting to a third-party location anonymizer, there is very little work that allows the users to fully control the disclosure of their data using their smartphones alone. In this paper, we propose a novel Android App called MoveWithMe which automatically generates mocking locations. Most importantly, these mocking locations are not random like those generated by original Android location mocking function. The proposed MoveWithMe app generates k traces of mocking locations and ensures that each trace looks like a trace of a real human and each trace is semantically different from the real user's trace.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着智能手机的普及，手机应用变得越来越流行。然而，许多移动应用程序需要用户的位置信息。如果位置隐私没有到位，这些移动应用程序用户将面临被恶意方跟踪的巨大风险。尽管已经通过求助于第三方位置匿名器对位置隐私问题进行了广泛的研究，但是很少有工作允许用户单独使用智能手机来完全控制其数据的公开。在本文中，我们提出了一个新颖的Android应用程序MoveWithMe，它可以自动生成嘲讽位置。最重要的是，这些嘲讽位置不像原始Android位置嘲讽功能生成的那些位置那样是随机的。提议的MoveWithMe应用程序生成k个模仿位置的轨迹，并确保每个轨迹看起来像真实人类的轨迹，并且每个轨迹在语义上不同于真实用户的轨迹。
papers.title_zh: 海报:连续查询的位置隐私方法

papers.title: Poster: Design of an Anomaly-based Threat Detection & Explication System
papers.authors: Robert Luh, Sebastian Schrittwieser, Stefan Marschalek, Helge Janicke, Edgar R. Weippl
papers.abstract: The poster corresponding to this summary depicts a proposition of a system able to explain anomalous behavior within a user session by considering anomalies identified through their deviation from a set of baseline process graphs. We adapt star structures, a bipartite representation used to approximate the edit distance between two graphs. Relevant processes are selected from a dictionary of benign and malicious traces generated through a sentiment-like bigram extraction and scoring system based on the log likelihood ratio test. We prototypically implemented smart anomaly explication through a number of competency questions derived and evaluated by a decision tree. The determined key factors are ultimately mapped to a dedicated APT attack stage ontology that considers actions, actors, as well as target assets.
papers.abstract_zh: 对应于该概述的海报描绘了一种系统的主张，该系统能够通过考虑通过其与一组基线过程图的偏差而识别的异常来解释用户会话内的异常行为。我们采用星形结构，一种用来近似两个图之间的编辑距离的二分表示。通过基于对数似然比测试的类情感二元模型提取和评分系统，从良性和恶意痕迹的字典中选择相关过程。我们通过由决策树导出和评估的许多能力问题，实现了智能异常解释的原型。所确定的关键因素最终被映射到考虑动作、参与者以及目标资产的专用APT攻击阶段本体。
papers.title_zh: 海报:基于异常的威胁检测和解释系统的设计

papers.title: Poster: Constrained Policy Mining in Attribute Based Access Control
papers.authors: Mayank Gautam, Sadhana Jha, Shamik Sural, Jaideep Vaidya, Vijayalakshmi Atluri
papers.abstract: In practical access control systems, it is important to enforce an upper bound on the time taken to respond to an access request. This response time is directly influenced by the size (often called the weight) of each of the underlying access control rules. We present a constrained policy mining algorithm which takes an access control matrix as input and generates a set of attribute based access control (ABAC) rules, such that the weight of each rule is not more than a specified value and the sum of weights of all the rules is minimized. Our initial experiments show encouraging results.
papers.abstract_zh: 在实际的访问控制系统中，对响应访问请求所用的时间施加上限是很重要的。这个响应时间直接受到每个底层访问控制规则的大小(通常称为权重)的影响。提出了一种约束策略挖掘算法，该算法以访问控制矩阵为输入，生成一组基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)规则，使得每条规则的权重不超过指定值，并且所有规则的权重之和最小。我们最初的实验显示了令人鼓舞的结果。
papers.title_zh: 海报:基于属性的访问控制中的约束策略挖掘

papers.title: POSTER: Access Control Model for the Hadoop Ecosystem
papers.authors: Maanak Gupta, Farhan Patwa, Ravi S. Sandhu
papers.abstract: Apache Hadoop is an important framework for fault-tolerant and distributed storage and processing of Big Data. Hadoop core platform along with other open-source tools such as Apache Hive, Storm, HBase offer an ecosystem to enable users to fully harness Big Data potential. Apache Ranger and Apache Sentry provide access control capabilities to several ecosystem components by offering centralized policy administration and enforcement through plugins. In this work we discuss the access control model for Hadoop ecosystem (referred as HeAC) used by Apache Ranger (release 0.6) and Sentry (release 1.7.0) along with Hadoop 2.x native authorization capabilities. This multi-layer model provides several access enforcement points to restrict unauthorized users to cluster resources. We further outline some preliminary approaches to extend the HeAC model consistent with widely accepted access control models.
papers.abstract_zh: Apache Hadoop是大数据容错分布式存储和处理的重要框架。Hadoop核心平台以及Apache Hive、Storm、HBase等其他开源工具提供了一个生态系统，使用户能够充分利用大数据的潜力。Apache Ranger和Apache Sentry通过插件提供集中的策略管理和执行，为几个生态系统组件提供访问控制功能。在本文中，我们将讨论Apache Ranger(0.6版)和Sentry(1 . 7 . 0版)使用的Hadoop生态系统的访问控制模型(简称为HeAC)以及Hadoop 2.x原生授权功能。这种多层模型提供了几个访问实施点，以限制未经授权的用户访问群集资源。我们进一步概述了一些初步的方法来扩展与广泛接受的访问控制模型一致的HeAC模型。
papers.title_zh: 海报:Hadoop生态系统的访问控制模型

papers.title: Poster: On the Safety and Efficiency of Virtual Firewall Elasticity Control
papers.authors: Hongda Li, Juan Deng, Hongxin Hu, Kuang-Ching Wang, Gail-Joon Ahn, Ziming Zhao, Wonkyu Han
papers.abstract: Firewalls have been typically used to enforce network access control. Network Functions Virtualization (NFV) envisions to implement firewall function as software instance (a.k.a virtual firewall). Virtual firewall provides great flexibility and elasticity, which are necessary to protect virtualized environments. In this poster, we propose an innovative virtual firewall controller, VFW Controller, which enables safe, efficient and cost-effective virtual firewall elasticity control. In addition, we implement the core components of VFW Controller on top of NFV and SDN environments. Our experimental results demonstrate that VFW Controller is efficient to provide safe elasticity control of virtual firewalls.
papers.abstract_zh: 防火墙通常用于加强网络访问控制。网络功能虚拟化(NFV)设想将防火墙功能实现为软件实例(也称为虚拟防火墙)。虚拟防火墙提供了极大的灵活性和弹性，这是保护虚拟化环境所必需的。在这张海报中，我们提出了一种创新的虚拟防火墙控制器，VFW控制器，它可以实现安全，高效和经济高效的虚拟防火墙弹性控制。此外，我们在NFV和SDN环境上实施了VFW控制器的核心组件。实验结果表明，VFW控制器能够有效地提供虚拟防火墙的安全弹性控制。
papers.title_zh: 海报:论虚拟防火墙弹性控制的安全性和效率

papers.title: Leveraging Hardware Isolation for Process Level Access Control & Authentication
papers.authors: Syed Kamran Haider, Hamza Omar, Ilia A. Lebedev, Srinivas Devadas, Marten van Dijk
papers.abstract: Critical resource sharing among multiple entities in a processing system is inevitable, which in turn calls for the presence of appropriate authentication and access control mechanisms. Generally speaking, these mechanisms are implemented via trusted software "policy checkers" that enforce certain high level application-specific "rules" to enforce a policy. Whether implemented as operating system modules or embedded inside the application ad hoc, these policy checkers expose additional attack surface in addition to the application logic. In order to protect application software from an adversary, modern secure processing platforms, such as Intel's Software Guard Extensions (SGX), employ principled hardware isolation to offer secure software containers or enclaves to execute trusted sensitive code with some integrity and privacy guarantees against a privileged software adversary. We extend this model further and propose using these hardware isolation mechanisms to shield the authentication and access control logic essential to policy checker software. While relying on the fundamental features of modern secure processors, our framework introduces productive software design guidelines which enable a guarded environment to execute sensitive policy checking code - hence enforcing application control flow integrity - and afford flexibility to the application designer to construct appropriate high-level policies to customize policy checker software.
papers.abstract_zh: 处理系统中的多个实体之间的关键资源共享是不可避免的，这反过来要求存在适当的认证和访问控制机制。一般来说，这些机制是通过可信软件“策略检查器”来实现的，该软件执行某些高级应用特定的“规则”来执行策略。无论是作为操作系统模块实现还是嵌入应用程序内部，这些策略检查器除了暴露应用程序逻辑之外，还会暴露其他攻击面。为了保护应用软件免受对手攻击，现代安全处理平台，如英特尔的软件保护扩展(SGX)，采用有原则的硬件隔离来提供安全的软件容器或飞地，以针对特权软件对手执行具有某些完整性和隐私保证的可信敏感代码。我们进一步扩展了这个模型，并建议使用这些硬件隔离机制来屏蔽对策略检查器软件至关重要的认证和访问控制逻辑。在依赖于现代安全处理器的基本特征的同时，我们的框架引入了生产性软件设计准则，该准则使受保护的环境能够执行敏感的策略检查代码，从而加强应用控制流的完整性，并为应用设计者提供构建适当的高级策略以定制策略检查器软件的灵活性。
papers.title_zh: 利用硬件隔离实现流程级访问控制和身份验证

papers.title: A Framework for the Cryptographic Enforcement of Information Flow Policies
papers.authors: James Alderman, Jason Crampton, Naomi Farley
papers.abstract: It is increasingly common to outsource data storage to untrusted, third party (e.g. cloud) servers. However, in such settings, low-level online reference monitors may not be appropriate for enforcing read access, and thus cryptographic enforcement schemes (CESs) may be required. Much of the research on cryptographic access control has focused on the use of specific primitives and, primarily, on how to generate appropriate keys and fails to model the access control system as a whole. Recent work in the context of role-based access control has shown a gap between theoretical policy specification and computationally secure implementations of access control policies, potentially leading to insecure implementations. Without a formal model, it is hard to (i) reason about the correctness and security of a CES, and (ii) show that the security properties of a particular cryptographic primitive are sufficient to guarantee security of the CES as a whole. In this paper, we provide a rigorous definitional framework for a CES that enforces read-only information flow policies (which encompass many practical forms of access control, including role-based policies). This framework (i) provides a tool by which instantiations of CESs can be proven correct and secure, (ii) is independent of any particular cryptographic primitives used to instantiate a CES, and (iii) helps to identify the limitations of current primitives (e.g. key assignment schemes) as components of a CES.
papers.abstract_zh: 将数据存储外包给不受信任的第三方(例如云)服务器越来越普遍。然而，在这种设置中，低级在线参考监控器可能不适合于实施读取访问，因此可能需要加密实施方案(cess)。许多关于密码访问控制的研究都集中在特定原语的使用上，并且主要集中在如何生成适当的密钥上，而没有将访问控制系统作为一个整体来建模。最近在基于角色的访问控制方面的工作显示了理论策略规范和访问控制策略的计算安全实现之间的差距，这可能导致不安全的实现。没有正式的模型，很难(I)推断CES的正确性和安全性，以及(ii)表明特定密码原语的安全属性足以保证CES作为一个整体的安全性。在本文中，我们为强制执行只读信息流策略的CES提供了一个严格的定义框架(它包含许多实际的访问控制形式，包括基于角色的策略)。该框架(I)提供了一种工具，通过该工具可以证明CESs的实例化是正确和安全的，(ii)独立于用于实例化CES的任何特定密码原语，以及(iii)有助于识别当前原语(例如密钥分配方案)作为CES组件的局限性。
papers.title_zh: 信息流策略的加密实施框架

papers.title: Towards PII-based Multiparty Access Control for Photo Sharing in Online Social Networks
papers.authors: Nishant Vishwamitra, Yifang Li, Kevin Wang, Hongxin Hu, Kelly Caine, Gail-Joon Ahn
papers.abstract: The privacy control models of current Online Social Networks (OSNs) are biased towards the content owners' policy settings. Additionally, those privacy policy settings are too coarse-grained to allow users to control access to individual portions of information that is related to them. Especially, in a shared photo in OSNs, there can exist multiple Personally Identifiable Information (PII) items belonging to a user appearing in the photo, which can compromise the privacy of the user if viewed by others. However, current OSNs do not provide users any means to control access to their individual PII items. As a result, there exists a gap between the level of control that current OSNs can provide to their users and the privacy expectations of the users. In this paper, we propose an approach to facilitate collaborative control of individual PII items for photo sharing over OSNs, where we shift our focus from entire photo level control to the control of individual PII items within shared photos. We formulate a PII-based multiparty access control model to fulfill the need for collaborative access control of PII items, along with a policy specification scheme and a policy enforcement mechanism. We also discuss a proof-of-concept prototype of our approach as part of an application in Facebook and provide system evaluation and usability study of our methodology.
papers.abstract_zh: 当前在线社交网络的隐私控制模型偏向于内容所有者的策略设置。此外，这些隐私策略设置过于粗糙，不允许用户控制对与其相关的信息的各个部分的访问。特别地，在OSNs中的共享照片中，可能存在属于出现在照片中的用户的多个个人可识别信息(PII)项目，如果被其他人查看，这可能危及用户的隐私。然而，当前的osn不为用户提供任何手段来控制对其个人PII项目的访问。因此，在当前osn能够向其用户提供的控制水平和用户的隐私期望之间存在差距。在本文中，我们提出了一种方法来促进osn上照片共享的单个PII项目的协作控制，其中我们将我们的重点从整个照片级控制转移到共享照片内单个PII项目的控制。我们制定了一个基于PII的多方访问控制模型，以满足PII项目的协作访问控制的需要，以及一个策略规范方案和一个策略执行机制。我们还讨论了我们方法的概念验证原型，作为脸书应用的一部分，并提供了我们方法的系统评估和可用性研究。
papers.title_zh: 面向在线社交网络中照片共享的基于PII的多方访问控制

papers.title: Verifiable Assume-Guarantee Privacy Specifications for Actor Component Architectures
papers.authors: Claiborne Johnson, Thomas MacGahan, John Heaps, Kevin Baldor, Jeffery von Ronne, Jianwei Niu
papers.abstract: Many organizations process personal information in the course of normal operations. Improper disclosure of this information can be damaging, so organizations must obey privacy laws and regulations that impose restrictions on its release or risk penalties. Since electronic management of personal information must be held in strict compliance with the law, software systems designed for such purposes must have some guarantee of compliance. To support this, we develop a general methodology for designing and implementing verifiable information systems. This paper develops the design of the History Aware Programming Language into a framework for creating systems that can be mechanically checked against privacy specifications. We apply this framework to create and verify a prototypical Electronic Medical Record System (EMRS) expressed as a set of actor components and first-order linear temporal logic specifications in assume-guarantee form. We then show that the implementation of the EMRS provably enforces a formalized Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) policy using a combination of model checking and static analysis techniques.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多组织在正常运营过程中会处理个人信息。此类信息的不当披露可能会造成损害，因此组织必须遵守隐私法律和法规，这些法律和法规对信息的披露施加了限制，否则将面临风险处罚。由于个人信息的电子管理必须严格遵守法律，因此为此目的而设计的软件系统必须具有某种合规性保证。为了支持这一点，我们开发了设计和实现可验证信息系统的通用方法。本文将历史感知编程语言的设计发展为一个框架，用于创建可以根据隐私规范进行机械检查的系统。我们应用该框架创建并验证了一个原型电子病历系统(EMRS ),该系统以假设-保证形式表示为一组角色组件和一阶线性时序逻辑规范。然后，我们展示了EMRS的实现使用模型检查和静态分析技术的组合，可证明地强制执行了正式的健康保险流通和责任法案(HIPAA)政策。
papers.title_zh: 演员组件体系结构的可验证假定保证隐私规范

papers.title: Authorization Enforcement Detection
papers.authors: Ehood Porat, Shmuel Tikochinski, Ariel Stulman
papers.abstract: One of the many aspects of website security is the question of authorization breach. It is an attack in which un-authorized entities are allowed access to restricted space. As the complexity of website code increases, the human capability of handling authorization rules and semantics decreases accordingly. In this project, we demonstrate an automated authorization enforcement detection (AED) tool which allows website administrators to check if they have authorization vulnerabilities on their sites.
papers.abstract_zh: 网站安全的诸多方面之一是授权违规问题。这是一种允许未经授权的实体进入受限空间的攻击。随着网站代码复杂性的增加，人类处理授权规则和语义的能力相应降低。在这个项目中，我们演示了一个自动授权执行检测(AED)工具，它允许网站管理员检查他们的网站上是否有授权漏洞。
papers.title_zh: 授权实施检测

papers.title: Multi-Layer Authorization Framework for a Representative Hadoop Ecosystem Deployment
papers.authors: Maanak Gupta, Farhan Patwa, James O. Benson, Ravi S. Sandhu
papers.abstract: Apache Hadoop is a predominant software framework to store and process vast amount of data, produced in varied formats. Data stored in Hadoop multi-tenant data lake often includes sensitive data such as social security numbers, intelligence sources and medical particulars, which should only be accessed by legitimate users. Apache Ranger and Apache Sentry are important authorization systems providing fine-grained access control across several Hadoop ecosystem services. In this paper, we provide a comprehensive explanation for the authorization framework offered by Hadoop ecosystem, incorporating core Hadoop 2.x native access control features and capabilities offered by Apache Ranger, with prime focus on data services including Apache Hive and Hadoop 2.x core services. A multi-layer authorization system is discussed and demonstrated, reflecting access control for services, data, applications and infrastructure resources inside a representative Hadoop ecosystem instance. A concrete use case is discussed to underline the application of aforementioned access control points. We use Hortonworks Hadoop distribution HDP 2.5 to exhibit this multi-layer access control framework.
papers.abstract_zh: Apache Hadoop是一个主要的软件框架，用于存储和处理各种格式的大量数据。存储在Hadoop多租户数据湖中的数据通常包括敏感数据，如社会安全号码、情报来源和医疗详情，这些数据只能由合法用户访问。Apache Ranger和Apache Sentry是重要的授权系统，提供跨多个Hadoop生态系统服务的细粒度访问控制。在本文中，我们对Hadoop生态系统提供的授权框架进行了全面的解释，结合了Apache Ranger提供的核心Hadoop 2.x原生访问控制特性和功能，主要关注数据服务，包括Apache Hive和Hadoop 2.x核心服务。讨论并演示了一个多层授权系统，该系统反映了在一个具有代表性的Hadoop生态系统实例中对服务、数据、应用和基础架构资源的访问控制。讨论一个具体的用例来强调上述访问控制点的应用。我们使用Hortonworks Hadoop发行版HDP 2.5来展示这个多层访问控制框架。
papers.title_zh: 典型Hadoop生态系统部署的多层授权框架

papers.title: Provable Enforcement of HIPAA-Compliant Release of Medical Records Using the History Aware Programming Language
papers.authors: Thomas MacGahan, Claiborne Johnson, Armando Rodriguez, Jeffery von Ronne, Jianwei Niu
papers.abstract: Dependence on reliable information systems to safeguard personally identifiable information implies a need for privacy policies which guide the release and management of such information, whose mismanaged disclosure can be damaging to both the subject and the organization that releases it. Enforcing such policies requires attention to detail and care, and thus any aid that a compiler can render may be of value. We present a demonstration of compiler enforcement of privacy policy by implementation of the History Aware Programming Language (HAPL) framework. This framework allows expression of arbitrary HAPL code for actors in an actor system to be used to back a web application. This code is then checked for compliance with privacy policies described in assume-guarantee form before being assembled into a functioning application. The framework is demonstrated by implementing five use cases based on scenarios described in the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA), and the performance of the framework is tested.
papers.abstract_zh: 依靠可靠的信息系统来保护个人身份信息，意味着需要隐私政策来指导此类信息的发布和管理，信息的不当披露会对主体和发布信息的组织造成损害。执行这样的策略需要注意细节和小心，因此编译器提供的任何帮助都是有价值的。我们通过实现历史感知编程语言(HAPL)框架展示了编译器隐私策略的实施。该框架允许在用于支持web应用的参与者系统中为参与者表达任意HAPL代码。然后，在将这些代码组装到正常运行的应用程序中之前，会检查这些代码是否符合假设保证表中描述的隐私策略。通过实现基于健康保险可移植性和责任法案(HIPAA)中描述的场景的五个用例来演示该框架，并测试该框架的性能。
papers.title_zh: 使用历史感知编程语言的符合HIPAA的病历发布的可证明实施

papers.title: NTApps: A Network Traffic Analyzer of Android Applications
papers.authors: Rodney Rodriguez, Shaikh Mostafa, Xiaoyin Wang
papers.abstract: Application-level network-traffic classification is important for many security-related tasks in network management. With the knowledge of which application certain network traffic belongs to, the network managers are able to allow/block certain applications in the network (whitelisting/blacklisting), or to locate known malicious applications in the network. To support application level network-traffic classification, the network managers require a network-signature for each possible applications in the network, so that they can match these signatures with the network traffic at runtime to identify the ownership of the traffic. The traditional approaches to generating network-signatures for applications require either manual inspection of the application or accumulated annotated network traffic of the application. These approaches are not efficient enough nowadays, given the recent emergence of mobile application markets, where hundreds to thousands of mobile apps are added everyday. In this paper, we present a fully automatic tool called NTApps to generate network signatures for the mobile apps in android market. NTApps is based on string analysis, and generates network signatures by statically estimating the possible values of network API arguments.
papers.abstract_zh: 应用层网络流量分类对于网络管理中许多与安全相关的任务非常重要。知道了特定网络流量属于哪个应用，网络管理员就能够允许/阻止网络中的特定应用(白名单/黑名单)，或者定位网络中已知的恶意应用。为了支持应用级网络流量分类，网络管理员需要网络中每个可能的应用的网络签名，以便他们可以在运行时将这些签名与网络流量进行匹配，以识别流量的所有权。为应用程序生成网络签名的传统方法要么需要人工检查应用程序，要么需要累积应用程序的带注释的网络流量。考虑到最近出现的移动应用市场，这些方法现在还不够有效，每天都有成百上千的移动应用被添加进来。在本文中，我们提出了一个名为NTApps的全自动工具，用于为android市场中的移动应用程序生成网络签名。NTApps基于字符串分析，通过静态估计网络API参数的可能值来生成网络签名。
papers.title_zh: NTA PPS:Android应用程序的网络流量分析器

papers.title: On the Satisfiability of Workflows with Release Points
papers.authors: Jason Crampton, Gregory Z. Gutin, Rémi Watrigant
papers.abstract: There has been a considerable amount of interest in recent years in the problem of workflow satisfiability, which asks whether the existence of constraints in a workflow specification means that it is impossible to allocate authorized users to each step in the workflow. Recent developments have seen the workflow satisfiability problem (WSP) studied in the context of workflow specifications in which the set of steps may vary from one instance of the workflow to another. This, in turn, means that some constraints may only apply to certain workflow instances. Inevitably, WSP becomes more complex for such workflow specifications. In this paper, we present the first fixed parameter algorithms to solve WSP for workflow specifications of this type. Moreover, we significantly extend the range of constraints that can be used in workflow specifications of this type.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，人们对工作流可满足性问题产生了相当大的兴趣，该问题询问工作流规范中约束的存在是否意味着不可能将授权用户分配到工作流中的每个步骤。最近的发展已经看到在工作流规范的背景下研究工作流可满足性问题(WSP ),在工作流规范中，一组步骤可以从工作流的一个实例变化到另一个实例。这反过来意味着一些约束可能只适用于某些工作流实例。对于这样的工作流规范，WSP不可避免地变得更加复杂。在本文中，我们提出了第一个固定参数算法来解决这种类型的工作流规范的WSP。此外，我们极大地扩展了可以在这种类型的工作流规范中使用的约束范围。
papers.title_zh: 具有发布点的工作流的可满足性

papers.title: A Secure Sum Protocol and Its Application to Privacy-preserving Multi-party Analytics
papers.authors: Shagufta Mehnaz, Gowtham Bellala, Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: Many enterprises are transitioning towards data-driven business processes. There are numerous situations where multiple parties would like to share data towards a common goal if it were possible to simultaneously protect the privacy and security of the individuals and organizations described in the data. Existing solutions for multi-party analytics that follow the so called Data Lake paradigm have parties transfer their raw data to a trusted third-party (i.e., mediator), which then performs the desired analysis on the global data, and shares the results with the parties. However, such a solution does not fit many applications such as Healthcare, Finance, and the Internet-of-Things, where privacy is a strong concern. Motivated by the increasing demands for data privacy, we study the problem of privacy-preserving multi-party data analytics, where the goal is to enable analytics on multi-party data without compromising the data privacy of each individual party. In this paper, we first propose a secure sum protocol with strong security guarantees. The proposed secure sum protocol is resistant to collusion attacks even with N-2 parties colluding, where N denotes the total number of collaborating parties. We then use this protocol to propose two secure gradient descent algorithms, one for horizontally partitioned data, and the other for vertically partitioned data. The proposed framework is generic and applies to a wide class of machine learning problems. We demonstrate our solution for two popular use-cases, regression and classification, and evaluate the performance of the proposed solution in terms of the obtained model accuracy, latency and communication cost. In addition, we perform a scalability analysis to evaluate the performance of the proposed solution as the data size and the number of parties increase.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多企业正在向数据驱动的业务流程过渡。在许多情况下，如果能够同时保护数据中描述的个人和组织的隐私和安全，多方会希望为了共同的目标共享数据。遵循所谓的数据湖范例的多方分析的现有解决方案使各方将其原始数据传送给可信的第三方(即，中介)，该第三方然后对全局数据执行期望的分析，并与各方共享结果。然而，这种解决方案并不适合许多应用，如医疗保健、金融和物联网，在这些应用中，隐私是一个非常重要的问题。受日益增长的数据隐私需求的推动，我们研究了保护隐私的多方数据分析问题，其目标是在不损害各方数据隐私的情况下对多方数据进行分析。在本文中，我们首先提出了一个具有强安全保证的安全sum协议。所提出的安全和协议即使在N-2方共谋的情况下也能抵抗共谋攻击，其中N表示协作方的总数。然后，我们使用该协议提出了两个安全的梯度下降算法，一个用于水平分区数据，另一个用于垂直分区数据。提出的框架是通用的，适用于广泛的机器学习问题。我们针对回归和分类这两个流行的用例演示了我们的解决方案，并根据所获得的模型准确性、延迟和通信成本来评估所提出的解决方案的性能。此外，随着数据大小和参与方数量的增加，我们执行可扩展性分析来评估所提议的解决方案的性能。
papers.title_zh: 安全和协议及其在隐私保护多方分析中的应用

papers.title: Enabling Data Sharing in Contextual Environments: Policy Representation and Analysis
papers.authors: Erisa Karafili, Emil C. Lupu
papers.abstract: Internet of Things environments enable us to capture more and more data about the physical environment we live in and about ourselves. The data enable us to optimise resources, personalise services and offer unprecedented insights into our lives. However, to achieve these insights data need to be shared (and sometimes sold) between organisations imposing rights and obligations upon the sharing parties and in accordance with multiple layers of sometimes conflicting legislation at international, national and organisational levels.
